# --- HUNK 1: Lines 428-483 ---
   428|             }
   429|         }
   430|     }
   431|     /**
   432|      * Run external transports
   433|      *
   434|      * @param  array  $obj  Alert-Array
   435|      * @return void
   436|      */
   437|     public function extTransports($obj)
   438|     {
   439|         $type = new Template;
   440|         $transport_maps = AlertUtil::getAlertTransports($obj['alert_id']);
   441|         if (! $transport_maps) {
   442|             $transport_maps = AlertUtil::getDefaultAlertTransports();
   443|         }
   444|         if (Config::get('alert.transports.mail') === true && ! empty($obj['contacts'])) {
   445|             $transport_maps[] = [
   446|                 'transport_id' => null,
   447|                 'transport_type' => 'mail',
   448|             ];
   449|         }
   450|         foreach ($transport_maps as $item) {
   451|             $class = Transport::getClass($item['transport_type']);
   452|             if (class_exists($class)) {
   453|                 $transport_title = "Transport {$item['transport_type']}";
   454|                 $obj['transport'] = $item['transport_type'];
   455|                 $obj['transport_name'] = $item['transport_name'];
   456|                 $obj['alert'] = new AlertData($obj);
   457|                 $obj['title'] = $type->getTitle($obj);
   458|                 $obj['alert']['title'] = $obj['title'];
   459|                 $obj['msg'] = $type->getBody($obj);
   460|                 c_echo(" :: $transport_title => ");
   461|                 try {
   462|                     $instance = new $class(AlertTransport::find($item['transport_id']));
   463|                     $tmp = $instance->deliverAlert($obj);
   464|                     $this->alertLog($tmp, $obj, $obj['transport']);
   465|                 } catch (AlertTransportDeliveryException $e) {
   466|                     Eventlog::log($e->getTraceAsString() . PHP_EOL . $e->getMessage(), $obj['device_id'], 'alert', Severity::Error);
   467|                     $this->alertLog($e->getMessage(), $obj, $obj['transport']);
   468|                 } catch (\Exception $e) {
   469|                     $this->alertLog($e, $obj, $obj['transport']);
   470|                 }
   471|                 unset($instance);
   472|                 echo PHP_EOL;
   473|             }
   474|         }
   475|         if (count($transport_maps) === 0) {
   476|             echo 'No configured transports';
   477|         }
   478|     }
   479|     public function alertLog($result, $obj, $transport)
   480|     {
   481|         $prefix = [
   482|             AlertState::RECOVERED => 'recovery',
   483|             AlertState::ACTIVE => $obj['severity'] . ' alert',

    16|  * Mail Transport
    17|  *
    18|  * @author f0o <f0o@devilcode.org>
    19|  * @copyright 2014 f0o, LibreNMS
    20|  * @license GPL
    21|  */
    22| namespace LibreNMS\Alert\Transport;
    23| use Exception;
    24| use LibreNMS\Alert\AlertUtil;
    25| use LibreNMS\Alert\Transport;
    26| use LibreNMS\Config;
    27| use LibreNMS\Exceptions\AlertTransportDeliveryException;
    28| class Mail extends Transport
    29| {
    30|     public function deliverAlert(array $alert_data): bool
    31|     {
    32|         $emails = match ($this->config['mail-contact'] ?? '') {
    33|             'sysContact' => AlertUtil::findContactsSysContact($alert_data['faults']),
    34|             'owners' => AlertUtil::findContactsOwners($alert_data['faults']),
    35|             'role' => AlertUtil::findContactsRoles([$this->config['role']]),
    36|             default => $this->config['email'] ?? $alert_data['contacts'] ?? [], // contacts is only used by legacy synthetic transport
    37|         };
    38|         $html = Config::get('email_html');
    39|         if ($html && ! $this->isHtmlContent($alert_data['msg'])) {
    40|             $msg = preg_replace("/\r?\n/", "<br />\n", $alert_data['msg']);
    41|         } else {
    42|             $msg = preg_replace("/(?<!\r)\n/", "\r\n", $alert_data['msg']);
    43|         }
    44|         try {
    45|             return \LibreNMS\Util\Mail::send($emails, $alert_data['title'], $msg, $html, $this->config['bcc'] ?? false, $this->config['attach-graph'] ?? null);
    46|         } catch (Exception $e) {
    47|             throw new AlertTransportDeliveryException($alert_data, 0, $e->getMessage());
    48|         }
    49|     }
    50|     public static function configTemplate(): array
    51|     {
    52|         $roles = array_merge(['None' => ''], \Bouncer::role()->pluck('name', 'title')->all());
    53|         return [
    54|             'config' => [
    55|                 [
    56|                     'title' => 'Contact Type',

    24| namespace LibreNMS\OS;
    25| use App\Models\EntPhysical;
    26| use App\Models\Transceiver;
    27| use Illuminate\Support\Collection;
    28| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Discovery\TransceiverDiscovery;
    29| use LibreNMS\OS\Shared\Radlan;
    30| use LibreNMS\OS\Traits\EntityMib;
    31| use LibreNMS\Util\StringHelpers;
    32| use SnmpQuery;
    33| class EltexMes23xx extends Radlan implements TransceiverDiscovery
    34| {
    35|     use EntityMib {
    36|         EntityMib::discoverEntityPhysical as discoverBaseEntityPhysical;
    37|     }
    38|     public function discoverEntityPhysical(): Collection
    39|     {
    40|         $inventory = $this->discoverBaseEntityPhysical();
    41|         $trans = SnmpQuery::hideMib()->enumStrings()->cache()->walk('ELTEX-MES-PHYSICAL-DESCRIPTION-MIB::eltPhdTransceiverInfoTable')->table(1);
    42|         $ifIndexToEntIndexMap = array_flip($this->getIfIndexEntPhysicalMap());
    43|         foreach ($trans as $ifIndex => $data) {
    44|             $inventory->push(new EntPhysical([
    45|                 'entPhysicalIndex' => 1000000 + $ifIndex,
    46|                 'entPhysicalDescr' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoType'],
    47|                 'entPhysicalClass' => 'sfp-cage',
    48|                 'entPhysicalName' => strtoupper($data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoConnectorType']),
    49|                 'entPhysicalModelName' => $this->normData($data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoPartNumber']),
    50|                 'entPhysicalSerialNum' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoSerialNumber'],
    51|                 'entPhysicalContainedIn' => $ifIndexToEntIndexMap[$ifIndex] ?? 0,
    52|                 'entPhysicalMfgName' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoVendorName'],
    53|                 'entPhysicalHardwareRev' => $this->normData($data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoVendorRev']),
    54|                 'entPhysicalParentRelPos' => 0,
    55|                 'entPhysicalIsFRU' => 'true',
    56|                 'ifIndex' => $ifIndex,
    57|             ]));
    58|         }
    59|         return $inventory;
    60|     }
    61|     public function discoverTransceivers(): Collection
    62|     {
    63|         $ifIndexToPortId = $this->getDevice()->ports()->pluck('port_id', 'ifIndex');
    64|         return SnmpQuery::hideMib()->enumStrings()->cache()->walk('ELTEX-MES-PHYSICAL-DESCRIPTION-MIB::eltPhdTransceiverInfoTable')
    65|             ->mapTable(function ($data, $ifIndex) use ($ifIndexToPortId) {
    66|                 return new Transceiver([
    67|                     'port_id' => $ifIndexToPortId->get($ifIndex, 0),
    68|                     'index' => $ifIndex,
    69|                     'connector' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoConnectorType'] ? strtoupper($data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoConnectorType']) : null,
    70|                     'distance' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoTransferDistance'] ?? null,
    71|                     'model' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoPartNumber'] ?? null,
    72|                     'revision' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoVendorRev'] ?? null,
    73|                     'serial' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoSerialNumber'] ?? null,
    74|                     'vendor' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoVendorName'] ?? null,
    75|                     'wavelength' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoWaveLength'] ?? null,
    76|                     'entity_physical_index' => $ifIndex,
    77|                 ]);
    78|             });
    79|     }
    80|     /**
    81|      * Specific HexToString for Eltex
    82|      */
    83|     protected function normData(string $par = ''): string
    84|     {
    85|         return StringHelpers::isHex($par) ? StringHelpers::hexToAscii($par, ' ') : $par;
    86|     }
    87| }

    26| use App\Models\PortsNac;
    27| use App\Models\Transceiver;

    37| class Procurve extends \LibreNMS\OS implements OSPolling, NacPolling, TransceiverDiscovery
    38| {
    39|     public function pollOS(DataStorageInterface $datastore): void
    40|     {
    41|         $FdbAddressCount = snmp_get($this->getDeviceArray(), 'hpSwitchFdbAddressCount.0', '-Ovqn', 'STATISTICS-MIB');
    42|         if (is_numeric($FdbAddressCount)) {
    43|             $rrd_def = RrdDefinition::make()->addDataset('value', 'GAUGE', -1, 100000);
    44|             $fields = [
    45|                 'value' => $FdbAddressCount,
    46|             ];
    47|             $tags = compact('rrd_def');
    48|             $datastore->put($this->getDeviceArray(), 'fdb_count', $tags, $fields);
    49|             $this->enableGraph('fdb_count');
    50|         }
    51|     }
    52|     public function pollNac()
    53|     {
    54|         $nac = new Collection();
    55|         $enabled = SnmpQuery::mibs(['IEEE8021-PAE-MIB'])->hideMib()->enumStrings()->get('dot1xPaeSystemAuthControl.0')->value();
    56|         if ($enabled !== 'enabled') {
    57|             return $nac;

# --- HUNK 2: Lines 96-135 ---
    96|                 continue;
    97|             }
    98|             $nacEntry = array_pop($entry);

   100|             $rowSet[$ifIndex]['authz_by'] = $nacEntry['hpicfDot1xAuthSessionAuthenticMethod'];
   101|             $rowSet[$ifIndex]['username'] = $nacEntry['hpicfDot1xAuthSessionUserName'];
   102|             $rowSet[$ifIndex]['time_elapsed'] = $nacEntry['hpicfDot1xAuthSessionTime'] / 100;
   103|         }

   110|         }

   112|             $nac->put($row['mac_address'], new PortsNac($row));
   113|         }

    25| namespace LibreNMS\OS;
    26| use App\Models\AccessPoint;
    27| use App\Models\Device;
    28| use App\Models\EntPhysical;
    29| use App\Models\Mempool;
    30| use App\Models\PortsNac;
    31| use App\Models\Sla;
    32| use App\Models\Transceiver;
    33| use App\Observers\ModuleModelObserver;
    34| use Carbon\Carbon;
    35| use Illuminate\Support\Arr;
    36| use Illuminate\Support\Collection;
    37| use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Log;
    38| use Illuminate\Support\Str;
    39| use LibreNMS\DB\SyncsModels;
    40| use LibreNMS\Device\Processor;
    41| use LibreNMS\Device\WirelessSensor;
    42| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Data\DataStorageInterface;
    43| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Discovery\MempoolsDiscovery;
    44| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Discovery\OSDiscovery;
    45| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Discovery\ProcessorDiscovery;
    46| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Discovery\Sensors\WirelessApCountDiscovery;
    47| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Discovery\Sensors\WirelessClientsDiscovery;
    48| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Discovery\SlaDiscovery;
    49| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Discovery\TransceiverDiscovery;
    50| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Polling\NacPolling;
    51| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Polling\OSPolling;
    52| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Polling\SlaPolling;
    53| use LibreNMS\OS;

    55| use LibreNMS\RRD\RrdDefinition;
    56| class Vrp extends OS implements
    57|     MempoolsDiscovery,
    58|     OSPolling,
    59|     ProcessorDiscovery,
    60|     NacPolling,
    61|     WirelessApCountDiscovery,
    62|     WirelessClientsDiscovery,
    63|     SlaDiscovery,
    64|     SlaPolling,
    65|     TransceiverDiscovery,
    66|     OSDiscovery
    67| {
    68|     use SyncsModels;
    69|     use EntityMib {EntityMib::discoverEntityPhysical as discoverBaseEntityPhysical; }
    70|     public function discoverEntityPhysical(): Collection
    71|     {
    72|         $inventory = $this->discoverBaseEntityPhysical();
    73|         $extra = \SnmpQuery::walk([
    74|             'HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityBoardType',
    75|             'HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityBomEnDesc',
    76|         ])->table(1);
    77|         $inventory->each(function (EntPhysical $entry) use ($extra) {
    78|             if (isset($entry->entPhysicalIndex)) {
    79|                 if (! empty($extra[$entry->entPhysicalIndex]['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityBomEnDesc'])) {
    80|                     $entry->entPhysicalDescr = $extra[$entry->entPhysicalIndex]['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityBomEnDesc'];
    81|                 }
    82|                 if (! empty($extra[$entry->entPhysicalIndex]['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityBoardType'])) {
    83|                     $entry->entPhysicalModelName = $extra[$entry->entPhysicalIndex]['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityBoardType'];
    84|                 }
    85|             }
    86|         });
    87|         return $inventory;
    88|     }
    89|     public function discoverTransceivers(): Collection
    90|     {
    91|         $ifIndexToPortId = $this->getDevice()->ports()->pluck('port_id', 'ifIndex');
    92|         $entityToIfIndex = $this->getIfIndexEntPhysicalMap();
    93|         return \SnmpQuery::walk('HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwOpticalModuleInfoTable')->mapTable(function ($data, $entIndex) use ($entityToIfIndex, $ifIndexToPortId) {
    94|             if ($data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalType'] === 'inactive') {
    95|                 return null;
    96|             }
    97|             if ($data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalType'] === '0') {
    98|                 return null;
    99|             }
   100|             $cable = $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalConnectType'] ?? null;
   101|             $distance = $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalTransferDistance'] ?? '';
   102|             if (preg_match_all("/(([0-9]+)\([^\)]+\))+/i", $distance, $matches)) {
   103|                 $distance = intval(max($matches[2]));
   104|             } else {
   105|                 $distance = intval($distance);
   106|             }
   107|             if ($distance <= 0) {
   108|                 $distance = $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalTransDistance'] ?? 0;
   109|             }
   110|             if ($distance <= 0) {
   111|                 $distance = null;
   112|             }
   113|             $wavelength = $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalWaveLengthExact'] ?? 0;
   114|             if ($wavelength <= 0) {
   115|                 $wavelength = $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalWaveLength'] ?? 0;
   116|             }
   117|             if ($wavelength <= 0) {
   118|                 $wavelength = null;
   119|             }
   120|             $ifIndex = $entityToIfIndex[$entIndex];
   121|             $port_id = $ifIndexToPortId->get($ifIndex) ?? null;
   122|             if (is_null($port_id)) {
   123|                 return null;
   124|             }
   125|             $type = $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalType'] ?? null;
   126|             $typeToDesc = ['unknown', 'sc', 'gbic', 'sfp', 'esfp', 'rj45', 'xfp', 'xenpak', 'transponder', 'cfp', 'smb', 'sfpplus', 'cxp', 'qsfp', 'qsfpplus', 'cfp2', 'dwdmsfp', 'msa100glh', 'gps', 'csfp', 'cfp4', 'qsfp28', 'sfpsfpplus', 'gponsfp', 'cfp8', 'sfp28', 'qsfpdd', 'cfp2dco', 'sfp56', 'qsfp56', 'oa'];
   127|             $mode = $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalMode'] ?? '';
   128|             $modeToText[1] = 'singleMode';
   129|             $modeToText[2] = 'multiMode5';
   130|             $modeToText[3] = 'multiMode6';
   131|             if (isset($modeToText[$mode])) {
   132|                 $mode = ' ' . $modeToText[$mode];
   133|             }
   134|             if (! is_null($type) && isset($typeToDesc[$type])) {
   135|                 $type = $typeToDesc[$type];
   136|             }
   137|             $entityType = $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalTransType'] ?? null;
   138|             if (! is_null($type) && ! is_null($entityType)) {
   139|                 $type .= " ($entityType)";
   140|             } else {
   141|                 $type = $type ?? $entityType;
   142|             }
   143|             if (! is_null($type)) {
   144|                 $type .= $mode;
   145|             }
   146|             return new Transceiver([
   147|                 'port_id' => $port_id,
   148|                 'index' => $entIndex,
   149|                 'vendor' => $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalVenderName'] ?? null,
   150|                 'type' => $type,
   151|                 'model' => $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalVenderPn'] ?? null,
   152|                 'serial' => $data['HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityOpticalVendorSn'] ?? null,
   153|                 'cable' => $cable,
   154|                 'distance' => $distance,
   155|                 'wavelength' => $wavelength,
   156|                 'entity_physical_index' => $entIndex,
   157|             ]);
   158|         })->filter();  // Filter out null values
   159|     }
   160|     public function discoverMempools()
   161|     {

   166|         $mempools_array = snmpwalk_cache_multi_oid($this->getDeviceArray(), 'hwEntityMemSizeMega', $mempools_array, 'HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB', 'huawei');
   167|         $mempools_array = snmpwalk_cache_multi_oid($this->getDeviceArray(), 'entPhysicalName', $mempools_array, 'HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB', 'huawei');
   168|         foreach (Arr::wrap($mempools_array) as $index => $entry) {
   169|             $size = empty($entry['hwEntityMemSizeMega']) ? ($entry['hwEntityMemSize'] ?? null) : $entry['hwEntityMemSizeMega'];

   174|                     'mempool_type' => 'vrp',
   175|                     'mempool_class' => 'system',
   176|                     'mempool_precision' => empty($entry['hwEntityMemSizeMega']) ? 1 : 1048576,

    44|         }

    47|     private function parseHardware(string $processor): ?string
    48|     {
    49|         preg_match('/(?<generic>\S+) Family (?<family>\d+) Model (?<model>\d+) Stepping (?<stepping>\d+)/', $processor, $matches);

    51|             'AMD64' => 'AMD x64',
    52|             'Intel64' => 'Intel x64',
    53|             'EM64T' => 'Intel x64',
    54|             'x86' => 'Generic x86',
    55|             'ia64' => 'Intel Itanium IA64',
    56|         ];
    57|         return $generic[$matches['generic']] ?? null;
    58|     }
    59|     private function getClientVersion(string $build, string $version): ?string

   117|     public static function portLink($port, $text = null, $type = null, $overlib = true, $single_graph = false)
   118|     {
   119|         if ($port === null) {
   120|             return $text;
   121|         }
   122|         $label = Rewrite::normalizeIfName($port->getLabel());
   123|         if (! $text) {
   124|             $text = $label;
   125|         }
   126|         $content = '<div class=list-large>' . addslashes(htmlentities(strip_tags($port->device?->displayName() . ' - ' . $label))) . '</div>';
   127|         if ($description = $port->getDescription()) {
   128|             $content .= addslashes(htmlentities(strip_tags($description))) . '<br />';
   129|         }
   130|         $content .= "<div style=\'width: 850px\'>";

   132|             'type' => $type ?: 'port_bits',
   133|             'legend' => 'yes',
   134|             'height' => 100,
   135|             'width' => 340,
   136|             'to' => Carbon::now()->timestamp,
   137|             'from' => Carbon::now()->subDay()->timestamp,
   138|             'id' => $port->port_id,
   139|         ];
   140|         $content .= self::graphTag($graph_array);
   141|         if (! $single_graph) {
   142|             $graph_array['from'] = Carbon::now()->subWeek()->timestamp;
   143|             $content .= self::graphTag($graph_array);
   144|             $graph_array['from'] = Carbon::now()->subMonth()->timestamp;

    25| namespace LibreNMS\Util;
    26| class Validate
    27| {
    28|     /**
    29|      * Checks if the give string is a valid hostname
    30|      *
    31|      * @param  string  $hostname
    32|      * @return bool
    33|      */
    34|     public static function hostname($hostname)
    35|     {
    36|         return
    37|             preg_match("/^([a-z\d](-*[a-z\d_])*)(\.([a-z\d](-*[a-z\d_])*))*\.?$/i", $hostname) //valid chars check
    38|             && preg_match('/^.{1,253}$/', $hostname) //overall length check
    39|             && preg_match("/^[^\.]{1,63}(\.[^\.]{1,63})*\.?$/", $hostname);
    40|     }
    41|     public static function ascDesc($direction, $default = 'ASC')
    42|     {
    43|         return in_array(strtolower($direction), ['asc', 'desc'], true)
    44|             ? $direction
    45|             : $default;
    46|     }
    47| }

   294|     def start_dispatch(self):

   296|         Start the dispatch timer, this is not called automatically on init
   297|         """
   298|         self.calculate_timer.start()

   302|         Stop the dispatch timer

   306|     def dispatch_calculate_billing(self):
   307|         self.post_work("calculate", 0)
   308|     def do_dispatch(self):
   309|         self.post_work("poll", 0)
   310|     def do_work(self, run_type, group):
   311|         if run_type == "poll":
   312|             logger.info("Polling billing")
   313|             args = ("-d", "-f") if self.config.debug else ("-f")
   314|             exit_code, output = LibreNMS.call_script("poll-billing.php", args)
   315|         else:  # run_type == 'calculate'
   316|             logger.info("Calculating billing")
   317|             args = ("-d", "-f") if self.config.debug else ("-f")
   318|             exit_code, output = LibreNMS.call_script("billing-calculate.php", args)
   319|         if exit_code != 0:
   320|             logger.warning(
   321|                 "Error {} in {} billing:\n{}".format(exit_code, run_type, output)
   322|             )
   323|         if self.config.log_output:
   324|             with open(
   325|                 "{}/dispatch_billing-{}.log".format(self.config.logdir, run_type), "a"
   326|             ) as log_file:
   327|                 log_file.write(output)

     1| <?php
     2| namespace App\Console\Commands;
     3| use App\Console\LnmsCommand;
     4| use App\Models\Alert;
     5| use App\Models\AlertLog;
     6| use Exception;
     7| class MaintenanceDatabaseCleanup extends LnmsCommand
     8| {
     9|     protected $name = 'maintenance:database-cleanup';
    10|     /**
    11|      * Create a new command instance.
    12|      *
    13|      * @return void
    14|      */
    15|     public function __construct()
    16|     {
    17|         parent::__construct();
    18|     }
    19|     /**
    20|      * Execute the console command.
    21|      *
    22|      * @return int
    23|      */
    24|     public function handle()
    25|     {
    26|         try {
    27|             $deleted_alerts = Alert::leftJoin('alert_rules', 'alerts.rule_id', '=', 'alert_rules.id')
    28|                 ->whereNull('alert_rules.id')
    29|                 ->delete();
    30|             $this->info("Deleted $deleted_alerts orphaned Alerts");
    31|             $deleted_alert_logs = AlertLog::leftJoin('alert_rules', 'alert_log.rule_id', '=', 'alert_rules.id')
    32|                 ->whereNull('alert_rules.id')
    33|                 ->delete();
    34|             $this->info("Deleted $deleted_alert_logs orphaned AlertLogs");
    35|             return 0;
    36|         } catch (Exception $e) {
    37|             $this->error("Error: {$e->getMessage()}");
    38|             return 1;
    39|         }
    40|     }
    41| }

    54|             'url' => Url::deviceLink($device, null, [], 0, 0, 0, 1),
    55|             'hw' => $device->hardware,
    56|             'name' => $device->shortDisplayName(),
    57|         ];

    59|             $linksQuery = $device->links()->with('port', 'remoteDevice', 'remotePort');
    60|             $links = $linksQuery->get()->sortBy('port.ifName');
    61|         } else {
    62|             $links = [];
    63|         }

    65|             'selections' => [
    66|                 'list' => [
    67|                     'text' => 'List',

    69|                 ],
    70|                 'map' => [
    71|                     'text' => 'Map',
    72|                     'link' => route('device', ['device' => $device, 'tab' => 'neighbours', 'vars' => 'selection=map']),
    73|                 ],
    74|             ],

   225|     /**
   226|      * Get a list of all available node images with a label.
   227|      */
   228|     private function listNodeImages(): array
   229|     {
   230|         $images = [];
   231|         $image_translations = __('map.custom.edit.node.image_options');
   232|         foreach (Storage::disk('base')->files('html/images/custommap/icons') as $image) {
   233|             if (in_array(strtolower(pathinfo($image, PATHINFO_EXTENSION)), ['svg', 'png', 'jpg', 'gif'])) {
   234|                 $file = pathinfo($image, PATHINFO_BASENAME);
   235|                 $filename = pathinfo($image, PATHINFO_FILENAME);
   236|                 $images[$file] = $image_translations[$filename] ?? ucwords(str_replace(['-', '_'], [' - ', ' '], $filename));
   237|             }
   238|         }
   239|         foreach (CustomMapNodeImage::all() as $image) {
   240|             $images[$image->custom_map_node_image_id] = $image->name;
   241|         }
   242|         asort($images);
   243|         return $images;
   244|     }
   245|     /**
   246|      * Return the legend config
   247|      */
   248|     private function legendConfig(CustomMap $map): array
   249|     {
   250|         $legend = [

   255|             'hide_overspeed' => $map->legend_hide_overspeed,
   256|             'font_size' => $map->legend_font_size,
   257|             'colours' => $map->legend_colours,
   258|         ];
   259|         return $legend;
   260|     }

    25| namespace App\Http\Controllers\Maps;
    26| use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
    27| use App\Models\CustomMap;
    28| use App\Models\CustomMapEdge;
    29| use App\Models\CustomMapNode;
    30| use Illuminate\Http\JsonResponse;
    31| use Illuminate\Http\Request;
    32| use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Blade;
    33| use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
    34| use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Log;
    35| use LibreNMS\Config;
    36| use LibreNMS\Util\Number;
    37| class CustomMapDataController extends Controller
    38| {
    39|     public function get(Request $request, CustomMap $map): JsonResponse
    40|     {
    41|         $this->authorize('view', $map);
    42|         $map->load(['nodes.device', 'nodes.device.location', 'nodes.linked_map']);
    43|         $edges = [];
    44|         $nodes = [];
    45|         if ($map->legend_colours) {
    46|             $sorted_colours = $map->legend_colours;
    47|             ksort($sorted_colours, SORT_NUMERIC);
    48|         }
    49|         foreach ($map->edges as $edge) {
    50|             $edgeid = $edge->custom_map_edge_id;
    51|             $edges[$edgeid] = [
    52|                 'custom_map_edge_id' => $edge->custom_map_edge_id,
    53|                 'custom_map_node1_id' => $edge->custom_map_node1_id,
    54|                 'custom_map_node2_id' => $edge->custom_map_node2_id,
    55|                 'port_id' => $edge->port_id,
    56|                 'reverse' => $edge->reverse,
    57|                 'style' => $edge->style,
    58|                 'showpct' => $edge->showpct,
    59|                 'showbps' => $edge->showbps,
    60|                 'label' => $edge->label,
    61|                 'fixed_width' => $edge->fixed_width,
    62|                 'text_face' => $edge->text_face,
    63|                 'text_size' => $edge->text_size,
    64|                 'text_colour' => $edge->text_colour,
    65|                 'text_align' => $edge->text_align,
    66|                 'mid_x' => $edge->mid_x,
    67|                 'mid_y' => $edge->mid_y,
    68|             ];
    69|             if ($edge->port) {
    70|                 $edges[$edgeid]['device_id'] = $edge->port->device_id;
    71|                 $edges[$edgeid]['port_name'] = $edge->port->device->displayName() . ' - ' . $edge->port->getLabel();
    72|                 $edges[$edgeid]['port_info'] = Blade::render('<x-port-link-map :port="$port" />', ['port' => $edge->port]);
    73|                 $speedto = 0;
    74|                 $speedfrom = 0;
    75|                 $rateto = 0;
    76|                 $ratefrom = 0;
    77|                 if ($edge->port->port_descr_speed) {
    78|                     $speed_parts = explode('/', $edge->port->port_descr_speed, 2);
    79|                     if (count($speed_parts) == 1) {
    80|                         $speedto = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[0]);
    81|                         $speedfrom = $speedto;
    82|                     } elseif ($edge->reverse) {
    83|                         $speedto = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[1]);
    84|                         $speedfrom = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[0]);
    85|                     } else {
    86|                         $speedto = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[0]);
    87|                         $speedfrom = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[1]);
    88|                     }
    89|                     if ($speedto == 0 || $speedfrom == 0) {
    90|                         $speedto = 0;
    91|                         $speedfrom = 0;
    92|                     }

# --- HUNK 2: Lines 137-196 ---
   137|                 $edges[$edgeid]['port_topct'] = round($edges[$edgeid]['port_topct'], 2);
   138|                 $edges[$edgeid]['port_frompct'] = round($edges[$edgeid]['port_frompct'], 2);
   139|                 $edges[$edgeid]['port_tobps'] = $this->rateString($rateto);
   140|                 $edges[$edgeid]['port_frombps'] = $this->rateString($ratefrom);
   141|                 $edges[$edgeid]['width_to'] = $this->speedWidth($speedto);
   142|                 $edges[$edgeid]['width_from'] = $this->speedWidth($speedfrom);

   186|     public function save(Request $request, CustomMap $map): JsonResponse

# --- HUNK 3: Lines 217-294 ---
   217|             $map->newnodeconfig = $data['newnodeconf'];
   218|             $map->newedgeconfig = $data['newedgeconf'];
   219|             $map->save();
   220|             foreach ($data['nodes'] as $nodeid => $node) {
   221|                 if (strpos($nodeid, 'new') === 0) {
   222|                     $dbnode = new CustomMapNode;
   223|                     $dbnode->map()->associate($map);
   224|                 } else {
   225|                     $dbnode = $dbnodes[$nodeid];
   226|                     if (! $dbnode) {
   227|                         Log::error('Could not find existing node for node id ' . $nodeid);
   228|                         abort(404);
   229|                     }
   230|                 }
   231|                 $dbnode->device_id = is_numeric($node['title']) ? $node['title'] : null;
   232|                 $dbnode->linked_custom_map_id = str_starts_with($node['title'], 'map:') ? (int) str_replace('map:', '', $node['title']) : null;
   233|                 $dbnode->label = $node['label'];
   234|                 $dbnode->style = $node['shape'];
   235|                 $dbnode->icon = $node['icon'];

   237|                 $dbnode->node_image_id = $node['nodeimage'] ?? null;

   240|                 $dbnode->text_size = $node['font']['size'];

   246|                 $dbnode->y_pos = intval($node['y']);

   249|                 $newNodes[$nodeid] = $dbnode;
   250|             }
   251|             foreach ($data['edges'] as $edgeid => $edge) {
   252|                 if (strpos($edgeid, 'new') === 0) {
   253|                     $dbedge = new CustomMapEdge;
   254|                     $dbedge->map()->associate($map);
   255|                 } else {
   256|                     $dbedge = $dbedges[$edgeid];
   257|                     if (! $dbedge) {
   258|                         Log::error('Could not find existing edge for edge id ' . $edgeid);
   259|                         abort(404);
   260|                     }

   266|                 $dbedge->showpct = filter_var($edge['showpct'], FILTER_VALIDATE_BOOLEAN, FILTER_NULL_ON_FAILURE);
   267|                 $dbedge->showbps = filter_var($edge['showbps'], FILTER_VALIDATE_BOOLEAN, FILTER_NULL_ON_FAILURE);
   268|                 $dbedge->label = $edge['label'] ? $edge['label'] : '';
   269|                 $dbedge->fixed_width = $edge['fixed_width'];
   270|                 $dbedge->style = $edge['style'];
   271|                 $dbedge->text_face = $edge['text_face'];
   272|                 $dbedge->text_size = $edge['text_size'];
   273|                 $dbedge->text_colour = $edge['text_colour'];
   274|                 $dbedge->text_align = $edge['text_align'];
   275|                 $dbedge->mid_x = intval($edge['mid_x']);
   276|                 $dbedge->mid_y = intval($edge['mid_y']);
   277|                 $dbedge->save();
   278|                 $edgesProcessed[$dbedge->custom_map_edge_id] = true;
   279|             }
   280|             foreach ($map->edges as $edge) {
   281|                 if (! array_key_exists($edge->custom_map_edge_id, $edgesProcessed)) {
   282|                     $edge->delete();
   283|                 }
   284|             }
   285|             foreach ($map->nodes as $node) {
   286|                 if (! array_key_exists($node->custom_map_node_id, $nodesProcessed)) {
   287|                     $node->delete();
   288|                 }
   289|             }
   290|         });
   291|         return response()->json(['id' => $map->custom_map_id]);
   292|     }

    25| namespace App\Http\Controllers\Maps;
    26| use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
    27| use App\Models\CustomMapNodeImage;
    28| use enshrined\svgSanitize\Sanitizer;
    29| use Illuminate\Contracts\View\View;
    30| use Illuminate\Foundation\Http\FormRequest;
    31| use Illuminate\Http\JsonResponse;
    32| use Illuminate\Http\Response;
    33| use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Cache;
    34| class CustomMapNodeImageController extends Controller
    35| {
    36|     public function index(): View
    37|     {
    38|         $this->authorize('update');
    39|         return view('map.custom-nodeimage-manage', [
    40|             'images' => CustomMapNodeImage::orderBy('name')->get(),
    41|         ]);
    42|     }
    43|     public function show(CustomMapNodeImage $image)
    44|     {
    45|         try {
    46|             $imageContent = Cache::driver('file')
    47|                 ->remember($this->getCacheKey($image), new \DateInterval('P30D'), fn () => $image->image);
    48|         } catch (\ErrorException $e) {
    49|             $imageContent = $image->image;
    50|         }
    51|         if (empty($imageContent)) {
    52|             abort(404);
    53|         }
    54|         return response($imageContent, headers: [
    55|             'Content-Type' => $image->mime ?? getimagesizefromstring($imageContent)['mime'] ?? 'image/jpeg',
    56|         ]);
    57|     }
    58|     public function store(FormRequest $request): JsonResponse
    59|     {
    60|         $this->authorize('update');
    61|         $this->validate($request, [
    62|             'image' => 'image|mimes:png,jpg,svg,gif',
    63|             'name' => 'string',
    64|         ]);
    65|         if (! $request->image) {
    66|             return response()->json([
    67|                 'message' => 'No image was supplied',
    68|             ]);
    69|         }
    70|         $image = new CustomMapNodeImage;
    71|         $this->updateImage($request, $image);
    72|         $image->save();
    73|         return response()->json([
    74|             'result' => 'success',
    75|             'id' => $image->custom_map_node_image_id,
    76|             'name' => $image->name,
    77|             'version' => $image->version,
    78|         ]);
    79|     }
    80|     public function update(FormRequest $request, CustomMapNodeImage $image): JsonResponse
    81|     {
    82|         $this->authorize('update', $image);
    83|         $this->validate($request, [
    84|             'image' => 'image|mimes:png,jpg,svg,gif',
    85|             'name' => 'string',
    86|         ]);
    87|         $this->updateImage($request, $image);
    88|         $image->save();
    89|         return response()->json([
    90|             'result' => 'success',
    91|             'name' => $request['name'],
    92|             'version' => $image->version,
    93|         ]);
    94|     }
    95|     public function destroy(CustomMapNodeImage $image): Response
    96|     {
    97|         $this->authorize('update', $image);
    98|         if ($image->nodes->count() > 0) {
    99|             return response('Image is in use', 403)
   100|                       ->header('Content-Type', 'text/plain');
   101|         }
   102|         $image->delete();
   103|         return response('Success', 200)
   104|                   ->header('Content-Type', 'text/plain');
   105|     }
   106|     private function updateImage(FormRequest $request, CustomMapNodeImage $image)
   107|     {
   108|         if ($request->has('image')) {
   109|             $image_content = $request->image->getContent();
   110|             $mimeType = $request->image->getMimeType();
   111|             if ($mimeType == 'image/svg+xml') {
   112|                 $image_content = (new Sanitizer)->sanitize($image_content);
   113|             }
   114|             Cache::driver('file')->forget($this->getCacheKey($image)); // clear old image cache if present
   115|             $image->image = $image_content;
   116|             $image->version = md5($image_content);
   117|             $image->mime = $mimeType;
   118|         }
   119|         $image->name = $request->name;
   120|     }
   121|     private function getCacheKey(CustomMapNodeImage $image): string
   122|     {
   123|         return 'custommap_nodeimage_' . $image->custom_map_node_image_id . ':' . ($image->version ?? '');
   124|     }
   125| }

    32| class NetMapController extends Controller

    34|     public function netMap(Request $request, $vars = ''): View
    35|     {
    36|         $group_id = Url::parseOptions('group');
    37|         $group_name = DeviceGroup::where('id', '=', $group_id)->first('name');
    38|         if (! empty($group_name)) {
    39|             $group_name = $group_name->name;
    40|         }

    42|             'page_refresh' => Config::get('page_refresh', 300),

    49|                     'highlight' => [
    50|                         'border' => Config::get('network_map_legend.highlight.border'),
    51|                     ],
    52|                     'border' => Config::get('network_map_legend.highlight.border'),
    53|                 ],
    54|                 'borderWidth' => Config::get('network_map_legend.highlight.borderWidth'),
    55|             ],
    56|         ];
    57|         return view('map.netmap', $data);
    58|     }
    59| }


# ====================================================================
# FILE: app/Http/Controllers/Table/PortsController.php
# Total hunks: 2
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 94-163 ---
    94|             'ifMtu',
    95|             'ifSpeed',
    96|         ];
    97|     }
    98|     protected function baseQuery($request)
    99|     {
   100|         $query = Port::hasAccess($request->user())
   101|             ->with(['device', 'device.location'])
   102|             ->leftJoin('devices', 'ports.device_id', 'devices.device_id')
   103|             ->where('deleted', $request->get('deleted', 0)) // always filter deleted
   104|             ->when($request->get('hostname'), function (Builder $query, $hostname) {
   105|                 $query->where(function (Builder $query) use ($hostname) {
   106|                     $query->where('devices.hostname', 'like', "%$hostname%")
   107|                         ->orWhere('devices.sysName', 'like', "%$hostname%");
   108|                 });
   109|             })
   110|             ->when($request->get('ifAlias'), function (Builder $query, $ifAlias) {
   111|                 return $query->where('ifAlias', 'like', "%$ifAlias%");
   112|             })
   113|             ->when($request->get('errors'), function (Builder $query) {
   114|                 return $query->hasErrors();
   115|             })
   116|             ->when($request->get('state'), function (Builder $query, $state) {
   117|                 return match ($state) {
   118|                     'down' => $query->isDown(),
   119|                     'up' => $query->isUp(),
   120|                     'admindown' => $query->isShutdown(),
   121|                     default => $query,
   122|                 };
   123|             });
   124|         $select = [
   125|             'ports.*',
   126|             'hostname',
   127|         ];
   128|         if (array_key_exists('secondsIfLastChange', Arr::wrap($request->get('sort')))) {
   129|             $select[] = DB::raw('`devices`.`uptime` - `ports`.`ifLastChange` / 100 as secondsIfLastChange');
   130|         }
   131|         return $query->select($select);
   132|     }
   133|     /**
   134|      * @param  \App\Models\Port  $port
   135|      * @return array
   136|      */
   137|     public function formatItem($port)
   138|     {
   139|         $status = $port->ifOperStatus == 'down'
   140|             ? ($port->ifAdminStatus == 'up' ? 'label-danger' : 'label-warning')
   141|             : 'label-success';
   142|         return [
   143|             'status' => $status,
   144|             'device' => Url::deviceLink($port->device),
   145|             'port' => Url::portLink($port),
   146|             'secondsIfLastChange' => ceil($port->device?->uptime - ($port->ifLastChange / 100)),
   147|             'ifConnectorPresent' => ($port->ifConnectorPresent == 'true') ? 'yes' : 'no',
   148|             'ifSpeed' => $port->ifSpeed,
   149|             'ifMtu' => $port->ifMtu,
   150|             'ifInOctets_rate' => $port->ifInOctets_rate * 8,
   151|             'ifOutOctets_rate' => $port->ifOutOctets_rate * 8,
   152|             'ifInUcastPkts_rate' => $port->ifInUcastPkts_rate,
   153|             'ifOutUcastPkts_rate' => $port->ifOutUcastPkts_rate,
   154|             'ifInErrors' => $port->ifInErrors,
   155|             'ifOutErrors' => $port->ifOutErrors,
   156|             'ifInErrors_delta' => $port->poll_period ? Number::formatSi($port->ifInErrors_delta / $port->poll_period, 2, 3, 'EPS') : '',
   157|             'ifOutErrors_delta' => $port->poll_period ? Number::formatSi($port->ifOutErrors_delta / $port->poll_period, 2, 3, 'EPS') : '',
   158|             'ifType' => Rewrite::normalizeIfType($port->ifType),
   159|             'ifAlias' => htmlentities($port->ifAlias),
   160|             'actions' => (string) view('port.actions', ['port' => $port]),
   161|         ];
   162|     }
   163| }

    25| namespace App\Http\Controllers\Widgets;
    26| use App\Models\CustomMap;
    27| use Illuminate\Http\Request;
    28| use LibreNMS\Config;
    29| class CustomMapController extends WidgetController
    30| {
    31|     protected $title = 'Custom Map';
    32|     protected $defaults = [
    33|         'title' => null,
    34|         'custom_map' => null,
    35|         'screenshot' => false,
    36|     ];
    37|     public function __construct()
    38|     {
    39|         $this->authorizeResource(CustomMap::class, 'map');
    40|     }
    41|     public function getView(Request $request)
    42|     {
    43|         $data = $this->getSettings(true);
    44|         $data['map'] = CustomMap::find($data['custom_map']);
    45|         if (! $data['map']) {
    46|             return __('map.custom.widget.not_found');
    47|         }
    48|         $data['base_url'] = Config::get('base_url');
    49|         $data['background_config'] = $data['map']->getBackgroundConfig();
    50|         $data['map_conf'] = $data['map']->options;
    51|         $scalex = (float) $request->dimensions['x'] / (float) $data['map']->width;
    52|         $scaley = (float) $request->dimensions['y'] / (float) $data['map']->height;
    53|         $data['scale'] = min($scalex, $scaley);
    54|         return view('widgets.custom-map', $data);
    55|     }

    75|     /**
    76|      * Get the frontend config definition for this poller
    77|      *
    78|      * @param  \Illuminate\Support\Collection|bool|null  $groups  optionally supply full list of poller groups to avoid fetching multiple times
    79|      * @return array[]
    80|      */
    81|     public function configDefinition($groups = null)
    82|     {
    83|         if ($groups === null || $groups === true) {
    84|             $groups = PollerGroup::list();
    85|         }
    86|         $scheduleType = \LibreNMS\Config::get('schedule_type');
    87|         $pollerGloballyEnabled = $scheduleType['poller'] == 'legacy' ? \LibreNMS\Config::get('service_poller_enabled', true) : $scheduleType['poller'] == 'dispatcher';
    88|         $discoveryGloballyEnabled = $scheduleType['discovery'] == 'legacy' ? \LibreNMS\Config::get('service_discovery_enabled', true) : $scheduleType['discovery'] == 'dispatcher';
    89|         $servicesGloballyEnabled = $scheduleType['services'] == 'legacy' ? \LibreNMS\Config::get('service_services_enabled', true) : $scheduleType['services'] == 'dispatcher';
    90|         $alertGloballyEnabled = $scheduleType['alerting'] == 'legacy' ? \LibreNMS\Config::get('service_alerting_enabled', true) : $scheduleType['alerting'] == 'dispatcher';
    91|         $billingGloballyEnabled = $scheduleType['billing'] == 'legacy' ? \LibreNMS\Config::get('service_billing_enabled', true) : $scheduleType['billing'] == 'dispatcher';
    92|         $pingGloballyEnabled = $scheduleType['ping'] == 'legacy' ? \LibreNMS\Config::get('service_ping_enabled', true) : $scheduleType['ping'] == 'dispatcher';
    93|         return [
    94|             [
    95|                 'name' => 'poller_groups',
    96|                 'default' => \LibreNMS\Config::get('distributed_poller_group'),
    97|                 'value' => $this->poller_groups ?? \LibreNMS\Config::get('distributed_poller_group'),
    98|                 'type' => 'multiple',
    99|                 'options' => $groups,
   100|             ],
   101|             [

   104|                 'value' => (bool) ($this->poller_enabled ?? $pollerGloballyEnabled),
   105|                 'type' => 'boolean',
   106|             ],
   107|             [
   108|                 'name' => 'poller_workers',
   109|                 'default' => \LibreNMS\Config::get('service_poller_workers'),
   110|                 'value' => $this->poller_workers ?? \LibreNMS\Config::get('service_poller_workers'),

   112|                 'units' => 'workers',
   113|             ],

   115|                 'name' => 'poller_frequency',

   120|     public function getIfPhysAddressAttribute($mac)
   121|     {
   122|         if (! empty($mac)) {
   123|             return preg_replace('/(..)(..)(..)(..)(..)(..)/', '\\1:\\2:\\3:\\4:\\5:\\6', $mac);
   124|         }
   125|         return null;
   126|     }
   127|     /**
   128|      * @param  Builder  $query
   129|      * @return Builder
   130|      */
   131|     public function scopeIsDeleted($query)
   132|     {
   133|         return $query->where([
   134|             [$this->qualifyColumn('deleted'), 1],
   135|         ]);
   136|     }
   137|     /**
   138|      * @param  Builder  $query
   139|      * @return Builder
   140|      */
   141|     public function scopeIsNotDeleted($query)
   142|     {
   143|         return $query->where([
   144|             [$this->qualifyColumn('deleted'), 0],
   145|         ]);
   146|     }
   147|     /**
   148|      * @param  Builder  $query
   149|      * @return Builder
   150|      */
   151|     public function scopeIsUp($query)
   152|     {
   153|         return $query->where([
   154|             [$this->qualifyColumn('deleted'), '=', 0],
   155|             [$this->qualifyColumn('ignore'), '=', 0],
   156|             [$this->qualifyColumn('disabled'), '=', 0],
   157|             [$this->qualifyColumn('ifOperStatus'), '=', 'up'],
   158|         ]);
   159|     }
   160|     /**
   161|      * @param  Builder  $query
   162|      * @return Builder
   163|      */
   164|     public function scopeIsDown($query)
   165|     {
   166|         return $query->where([
   167|             [$this->qualifyColumn('deleted'), '=', 0],
   168|             [$this->qualifyColumn('ignore'), '=', 0],
   169|             [$this->qualifyColumn('disabled'), '=', 0],
   170|             [$this->qualifyColumn('ifOperStatus'), '!=', 'up'],
   171|             [$this->qualifyColumn('ifAdminStatus'), '=', 'up'],
   172|         ]);
   173|     }
   174|     /**
   175|      * @param  Builder  $query
   176|      * @return Builder
   177|      */
   178|     public function scopeIsShutdown($query)
   179|     {
   180|         return $query->where([
   181|             [$this->qualifyColumn('deleted'), '=', 0],
   182|             [$this->qualifyColumn('ignore'), '=', 0],
   183|             [$this->qualifyColumn('disabled'), '=', 0],
   184|             [$this->qualifyColumn('ifAdminStatus'), '=', 'down'],
   185|         ]);
   186|     }
   187|     /**
   188|      * @param  Builder  $query
   189|      * @return Builder
   190|      */
   191|     public function scopeIsIgnored($query)
   192|     {
   193|         return $query->where([
   194|             [$this->qualifyColumn('deleted'), '=', 0],
   195|             [$this->qualifyColumn('ignore'), '=', 1],
   196|         ]);
   197|     }
   198|     /**
   199|      * @param  Builder  $query
   200|      * @return Builder
   201|      */
   202|     public function scopeIsDisabled($query)
   203|     {
   204|         return $query->where([
   205|             [$this->qualifyColumn('deleted'), '=', 0],
   206|             [$this->qualifyColumn('disabled'), '=', 1],
   207|         ]);
   208|     }
   209|     /**
   210|      * @param  Builder  $query
   211|      * @return Builder
   212|      */
   213|     public function scopeHasErrors($query)
   214|     {
   215|         return $query->where([
   216|             [$this->qualifyColumn('deleted'), '=', 0],
   217|             [$this->qualifyColumn('ignore'), '=', 0],
   218|             [$this->qualifyColumn('disabled'), '=', 0],
   219|         ])->where(function ($query) {
   220|             /** @var Builder $query */
   221|             $query->where($this->qualifyColumn('ifInErrors_delta'), '>', 0)
   222|                 ->orWhere($this->qualifyColumn('ifOutErrors_delta'), '>', 0);
   223|         });
   224|     }
   225|     /**
   226|      * @param  Builder  $query
   227|      * @return Builder
   228|      */
   229|     public function scopeIsValid($query)
   230|     {
   231|         return $query->where([
   232|             [$this->qualifyColumn('deleted'), '=', 0],
   233|             [$this->qualifyColumn('disabled'), '=', 0],
   234|         ]);
   235|     }
   236|     public function scopeHasAccess($query, User $user)
   237|     {
   238|         return $this->hasPortAccess($query, $user);
   239|     }
   240|     public function scopeInPortGroup($query, $portGroup)
   241|     {
   242|         return $query->whereIn($query->qualifyColumn('port_id'), function ($query) use ($portGroup) {
   243|             $query->select('port_id')
   244|                 ->from('port_group_port')
   245|                 ->where('port_group_id', $portGroup);
   246|         });
   247|     }
   248|     public function adsl(): \Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Relations\HasOne
   249|     {
   250|         return $this->hasOne(PortAdsl::class, 'port_id');
   251|     }
   252|     public function vdsl(): \Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Relations\HasOne
   253|     {

     1| <?php
     2| namespace App\View\Components;
     3| use App\Facades\DeviceCache;
     4| use App\Models\Device;
     5| use Illuminate\View\Component;
     6| use LibreNMS\Util\Graph;
     7| class DeviceLinkMap extends Component
     8| {
     9|     /**
    10|      * @var \App\Models\Device
    11|      */
    12|     public $device;
    13|     /**
    14|      * Create a new component instance.
    15|      *
    16|      * @param  int|\App\Models\Device  $device
    17|      */
    18|     public function __construct($device)
    19|     {
    20|         $this->device = $device instanceof Device ? $device : DeviceCache::get($device);
    21|     }
    22|     /**
    23|      * Get the view / contents that represent the component.
    24|      *
    25|      * @return \Illuminate\Contracts\View\View|\Closure|string
    26|      */
    27|     public function render()
    28|     {
    29|         if (empty($this->device->device_id)) {
    30|             return view('components.device-link-missing');
    31|         }
    32|         if (! $this->device->canAccess(auth()->user())) {
    33|             return view('components.device-link-no-access');
    34|         }
    35|         return view('components.device-link-map', [
    36|             'graphs' => Graph::getOverviewGraphsForDevice($this->device),
    37|         ]);
    38|     }
    39| }

    28| $params = [];

    30|     if (is_numeric($options['h'])) {
    31|         $where = 'AND `S`.`device_id` = ?';
    32|         $params[] = (int) $options['h'];
    33|     } else {
    34|         if (preg_match('/\*/', $options['h'])) {
    35|             $where = "AND `hostname` LIKE '?'";
    36|             $params[] = str_replace('*', '%', $options['h']);
    37|         } else {
    38|             $where = "AND `hostname` = '?'";
    39|             $params[] = $options['h'];
    40|         }
    41|     }
    42| } else {

    45|         if (Debug::isEnabled()) {
    46|             echo "Services are not enabled for cron scheduling\n";
    47|         }
    48|         exit(0);
    49|     }
    50| }
    51| $sql = 'SELECT D.*,S.*,attrib_value  FROM `devices` AS D'
    52|        . ' INNER JOIN `services` AS S ON S.device_id = D.device_id AND D.disabled = 0 ' . $where
    53|        . ' LEFT JOIN `devices_attribs` as A ON D.device_id = A.device_id AND A.attrib_type = "override_icmp_disable"'
    54|        . ' ORDER by D.device_id DESC;';

    56|     if (! $service['service_disabled'] && ($service['status'] == 1 || ($service['status'] == 0 && $service['status_reason'] === 'snmp') ||
    57|         $service['attrib_value'] === 'true' || (! is_null($service['service_ip']) && $service['service_ip'] !== $service['hostname'] &&
    58|         $service['service_ip'] !== inet6_ntop($service['ip'])))) {
    59|         poll_service($service);
    60|         $polled_services++;
    61|     } else {
    62|         if (! $service['service_disabled']) {
    63|             d_echo("\nService check - " . $service['service_id'] . "\nSkipping service check because device "

    68|                 $service['device_id'],

    48| check_dependencies() {

    50|     branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
    51|     scripts/check_requirements.py > /dev/null 2>&1 || pip3 install -r requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1
    52|     ver_71=$(php -r "echo (int)version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '7.1.3', '<');")

    54|     ver_73=$(php -r "echo (int)version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '7.3', '<');")
    55|     ver_81=$(php -r "echo (int)version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '8.1', '<');")
    56|     ver_82=$(php -r "echo (int)version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '8.2', '<');")
    57|     python3=$(python3 -c "import sys;print(int(sys.version_info < (3, 4)))" 2> /dev/null)
    58|     python_deps=$("${LIBRENMS_DIR}/scripts/check_requirements.py" > /dev/null 2>&1; echo $?)

    60|     pythonver="master"
    61|     old_branches="^(php53|php56|php71-python2|php72|php73|php81)$"

    63|         status_run "Supported PHP and Python version, switched back to master branch." 'git checkout master'
    64|     elif [[ "$ver_71" != "0" ]]; then
    65|         phpver="php56"
    66|         if [[ "$branch" != "php56" ]]; then
    67|             status_run "Unsupported PHP version, switched to php56 branch." 'git checkout php56'
    68|         fi
    69|     elif [[ "$ver_72" != "0" || "$python3" != "0" || "$python_deps" != "0" ]]; then
    70|         msg=""
    71|         if [[ "$ver_72" != "0" ]]; then
    72|             msg="Unsupported PHP version, $msg"
    73|             phpver="php71"
    74|         fi
    75|         if [[ "$python3" != "0" ]]; then
    76|             msg="python3 is not available, $msg"
    77|             pythonver="python3-missing"
    78|         elif [[ "$python_deps" != "0" ]]; then
    79|             msg="Python 3 dependencies missing, $msg"
    80|             pythonver="python3-deps"
    81|         fi
    82|         if [[ "$branch" != "php71-python2" ]]; then
    83|             status_run "${msg}switched to php71-python2 branch." 'git checkout php71-python2'
    84|         fi
    85|     elif [[ "$ver_73" != "0" ]]; then
    86|         phpver="php72"
    87|         if [[ "$branch" != "php72" ]]; then
    88|             status_run "Unsupported PHP version, switched to php72 branch." 'git checkout php72'
    89|         fi
    90|     elif [[ "$ver_81" != "0" ]]; then
    91|         phpver="php73"
    92|         if [[ "$branch" != "php73" ]]; then
    93|             status_run "Unsupported PHP version, switched to php73 branch." 'git checkout php73'
    94|         fi
    95|     elif [[ "$ver_82" != "0" ]]; then
    96|         phpver="php81"
    97|         if [[ "$branch" != "php81" ]]; then
    98|             status_run "Unsupported PHP version, switched to php81 branch." 'git checkout php81'
    99|         fi
   100|     fi
   101|     set_notifiable_result phpver ${phpver}
   102|     set_notifiable_result pythonver ${pythonver}
   103|     if [[ "$phpver" == "master" && "$pythonver" == "master" ]]; then
   104|         return 0
   105|     fi
   106|     return 1
   107| }
   108| version_compare () {
   109|     local i ver1 ver2 parts1 parts2
   110|     if [[ "$1" == "$2" ]]; then
   111|         return 0
   112|     fi
   113|     IFS=. read -ra ver1 <<< "$1"
   114|     IFS=. read -ra ver2 <<< "$2"
   115|     parts2=${#ver2[@]}
   116|     [[ -n $3 ]] && parts2=$3
   117|     for ((i=${#ver1[@]}; i<parts2; i++)); do
   118|         ver1[i]=0

    24|     protected function migrateCharsetTo($charset, $collation)
    25|     {
    26|         if (\LibreNMS\DB\Eloquent::getDriver() != 'mysql') {
    27|             return;
    28|         }
    29|         $databaseName = DB::connection()->getDatabaseName();
    30|         DB::unprepared("ALTER SCHEMA `{$databaseName}` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET {$charset} DEFAULT COLLATE {$collation};");
    31|         $tableNames = DB::table('information_schema.tables')
    32|             ->where('table_schema', $databaseName)
    33|             ->where('TABLE_TYPE', 'BASE TABLE')
    34|             ->pluck('TABLE_NAME');
    35|         foreach ($tableNames as $tableName) {
    36|             DB::unprepared("ALTER TABLE `{$tableName}` CHARACTER SET {$charset} COLLATE {$collation};");
    37|         }
    38|         $columns = DB::table('information_schema.columns')
    39|             ->where('table_schema', $databaseName)
    40|             ->whereNotNull('CHARACTER_SET_NAME')
    41|             ->whereNotNull('COLLATION_NAME')
    42|             ->where(function ($query) use ($charset, $collation) {
    43|                 $query->where('CHARACTER_SET_NAME', '!=', $charset)
    44|                       ->orWhere('COLLATION_NAME', '!=', $collation);
    45|             })
    46|             ->get();
    47|         foreach ($columns as $column) {
    48|             $null = $column->IS_NULLABLE == 'YES' ? 'NULL' : 'NOT NULL';
    49|             $default = null;
    50|             if (is_null($column->COLUMN_DEFAULT) || $column->COLUMN_DEFAULT == 'NULL') {
    51|             } else {
    52|                 $default = "DEFAULT '" . trim($column->COLUMN_DEFAULT, '\'') . "'";
    53|             }

# FILE: discovery-wrapper.py
# Total hunks: 2
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-68 ---
     1| """
     2| This is a Bootstrap script for wrapper.py, in order to retain compatibility with earlier LibreNMS setups
     3| """
     4| import logging
     5| import os
     6| import sys
     7| from argparse import ArgumentParser
     8| import LibreNMS
     9| import LibreNMS.wrapper as wrapper
    10| WRAPPER_TYPE = "discovery"
    11| DEFAULT_WORKERS = 1
    12| """
    13|     Take the amount of threads we want to run in parallel from the commandline
    14|     if None are given or the argument was garbage, fall back to default
    15| """
    16| usage = (
    17|     "usage: %(prog)s [options] <amount_of_workers> (Default: {}"
    18|     "(Do not set too high, or you will get an OOM)".format(DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    19| )
    20| description = "Spawn multiple discovery.php processes in parallel."
    21| parser = ArgumentParser(usage=usage, description=description)
    22| parser.add_argument(dest="amount_of_workers", default=DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    23| parser.add_argument(
    24|     "-d",
    25|     "--debug",
    26|     dest="debug",
    27|     action="store_true",
    28|     default=False,
    29|     help="Enable debug output. WARNING: Leaving this enabled will consume a lot of disk space.",
    30| )
    31| parser.add_argument(
    32|     "-m",
    33|     "--modules",
    34|     dest="modules",
    35|     default="",
    36|     help="Enable passing of a module string, modules are separated by comma",
    37| )
    38| args = parser.parse_args()
    39| config = LibreNMS.get_config_data(os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__)))
    40| if not config:
    41|     logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    42|     logger.critical("Could not run {} wrapper. Missing config".format(WRAPPER_TYPE))
    43|     sys.exit(1)
    44| log_dir = config["log_dir"]
    45| log_file = os.path.join(log_dir, WRAPPER_TYPE + "_wrapper.log")
    46| logger = LibreNMS.logger_get_logger(log_file, debug=args.debug)
    47| scheduler = config.get("schedule_type").get("discovery", "legacy")
    48| enabled = True if scheduler == "legacy" else scheduler == "cron"
    49| if not enabled:
    50|     logger.debug("Discovery is not enabled for cron scheduling")
    51|     sys.exit(0)
    52| try:
    53|     amount_of_workers = int(args.amount_of_workers)
    54| except (IndexError, ValueError):
    55|     amount_of_workers = DEFAULT_WORKERS
    56|     logger.warning(
    57|         "Bogus number of workers given. Using default number ({}) of workers.".format(
    58|             amount_of_workers
    59|         )
    60|     )
    61| wrapper.wrapper(
    62|     WRAPPER_TYPE,
    63|     amount_of_workers=amount_of_workers,
    64|     config=config,
    65|     log_dir=log_dir,
    66|     modules=args.modules or "",
    67|     _debug=args.debug,
    68| )

   680|  * @return int
   681|  */
   682| function set_numeric($value, $default = 0)
   683| {
   684|     if (! is_numeric($value) ||
   685|         is_nan($value) ||
   686|         is_infinite($value)
   687|     ) {
   688|         $value = $default;
   689|     }
   690|     return $value;
   691| }
   692| function get_vm_parent_id($device)
   693| {
   694|     if (empty($device['hostname'])) {
   695|         return false;
   696|     }
   697|     return dbFetchCell('SELECT `device_id` FROM `vminfo` WHERE `vmwVmDisplayName` = ? OR `vmwVmDisplayName` = ?', [$device['hostname'], $device['hostname'] . '.' . Config::get('mydomain')]);
   698| }
   699| /**
   700|  * Converts ieee754 32-bit floating point decimal represenation to decimal
   701|  */
   702| function ieee754_to_decimal($value)
   703| {
   704|     $hex = dechex($value);
   705|     $binary = str_pad(base_convert($hex, 16, 2), 32, '0', STR_PAD_LEFT);
   706|     $sign = (int) $binary[0];
   707|     $exponent = bindec(substr($binary, 1, 8)) - 127;
   708|     $mantissa = substr($binary, 9);
   709|     $mantissa_value = 1;
   710|     for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($mantissa); $i++) {
   711|         if ($mantissa[$i] == '1') {
   712|             $mantissa_value += pow(2, -($i + 1));
   713|         }
   714|     }
   715|     $value = pow(-1, $sign) * $mantissa_value * pow(2, $exponent);
   716|     return $value;
   717| }
   718| /**
   719|  * Index an array by a column
   720|  *
   721|  * @param  array  $array
   722|  * @param  string|int  $column
   723|  * @return array
   724|  */
   725| function array_by_column($array, $column)
   726| {
   727|     return array_combine(array_column($array, $column), $array);
   728| }

    12|         $entPhysicalIndex_measured = 'ports';
    13|         $descr = makeshortif($entry['HP-ICF-TRANSCEIVER-MIB::hpicfXcvrPortDesc']) . ' Bias Current';

  1035| function update_device_port_notes(Illuminate\Http\Request $request): JsonResponse
  1036| {
  1037|     $portid = $request->route('portid');
  1038|     $hostname = $request->route('hostname');
  1039|     $device = \DeviceCache::get($hostname);
  1040|     $data = json_decode($request->getContent(), true);
  1041|     $field = 'notes';
  1042|     $content = $data[$field];
  1043|     if (empty($data)) {
  1044|         return api_error(400, 'Port field to patch has not been supplied.');
  1045|     }
  1046|     if ($device->setAttrib('port_id_notes:' . $portid, $content)) {
  1047|         return api_success_noresult(200, 'Port ' . $field . ' field has been updated');
  1048|     } else {
  1049|         return api_error(500, 'Port ' . $field . ' field failed to be updated');
  1050|     }
  1051| }

    46| function escape_quotes($text)
    47| {
    48|     return str_replace('"', "\'", str_replace("'", "\'", $text));
    49| }//end escape_quotes()
    50| function generate_overlib_content($graph_array, $text)
    51| {
    52|     $overlib_content = '<div class=overlib><span class=overlib-text>' . htmlspecialchars($text) . '</span><br />';
    53|     foreach (['day', 'week', 'month', 'year'] as $period) {
    54|         $graph_array['from'] = Config::get("time.$period");
    55|         $overlib_content .= escape_quotes(\LibreNMS\Util\Url::graphTag($graph_array));
    56|     }
    57|     $overlib_content .= '</div>';
    58|     return $overlib_content;
    59| }//end generate_overlib_content()

     3| use LibreNMS\Data\Store\Datastore;

     5| $init_modules = ['alerts', 'laravel', 'nodb'];
     6| require __DIR__ . '/includes/init.php';
     7| $options = getopt('fhdvrg:');
     8| if (isset($options['h'])) {
     9|     echo <<<'END'
    10| ping.php: Usage ping.php [-d] [-v] [-r] [-g group(s)]
    11|   -d enable debug output
    12|   -v enable verbose debug output
    13|   -r do not create or update RRDs
    14|   -g only ping devices for this poller group, may be comma separated list
    15| END;
    16|     exit;
    17| }
    18| $scheduler = \LibreNMS\Config::get('schedule_type.ping');
    19| if (! isset($options['f']) && $scheduler != 'legacy' && $scheduler != 'cron') {
    20|     if (Debug::isEnabled()) {
    21|         echo "Fast Pings are not enabled for cron scheduling.  Add the -f command argument if you want to force this command to run.\n";
    22|     }
    23|     exit(0);
    24| }
    25| Debug::set(isset($options['d']));
    26| Debug::setVerbose(isset($options['v']));
    27| Datastore::init($options);
    28| if (isset($options['g'])) {
    29|     $groups = explode(',', $options['g']);
    30| } else {
    31|     $groups = [];
    32| }
    33| PingCheck::dispatchSync($groups);

     1| <?php
     2| /*
     3|  * LibreNMS
     4|  *
     5|  *   This file is part of LibreNMS.
     6|  *
     7|  * @package    LibreNMS
     8|  * @subpackage billing
     9|  * @copyright  (C) 2006 - 2012 Adam Armstrong
    10|  */
    11| use LibreNMS\Billing;
    12| use LibreNMS\Config;
    13| use LibreNMS\Data\Store\Datastore;
    14| use LibreNMS\Util\Debug;
    15| $init_modules = [];
    16| require __DIR__ . '/includes/init.php';
    17| if (isset($argv[1]) && is_numeric($argv[1])) {
    18|     $options = ['b' => $argv[1]];
    19| } else {
    20|     $options = getopt('fdb:');
    21| }
    22| Debug::set(isset($options['d']));
    23| Datastore::init();

    26|     if (Debug::isEnabled()) {
    27|         echo "Billing is not enabled for cron scheduling. Add the -f command argument if you want to force this command to run.\n";
    28|     }
    29|     exit(0);
    30| }

    32| echo "Starting Polling Session ... \n\n";

    34| if (isset($options['b'])) {
    35|     $query->where('bill_id', $options['b']);
    36| }
    37| foreach ($query->get(['bill_id', 'bill_name']) as $bill) {
    38|     echo 'Bill : ' . $bill->bill_name . "\n";
    39|     $bill_id = $bill->bill_id;
    40|     if ($config['distributed_poller'] && $config['distributed_billing']) {

    42|     } else {
    43|         $port_list = dbFetchRows('SELECT * FROM `bill_ports` as P, `ports` as I, `devices` as D WHERE P.bill_id=? AND I.port_id = P.port_id AND I.ifOperStatus="up" AND D.device_id = I.device_id AND D.status=1', [$bill_id]);
    44|     }
    45|     $now = dbFetchCell('SELECT NOW()');
    46|     $delta = 0;
    47|     $in_delta = 0;
    48|     $out_delta = 0;
    49|     foreach ($port_list as $port_data) {
    50|         $port_id = $port_data['port_id'];


# ====================================================================
# FILE: poller-wrapper.py
# Total hunks: 2
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-68 ---
     1| """
     2| This is a Bootstrap script for wrapper.py, in order to retain compatibility with earlier LibreNMS setups
     3| """
     4| import logging
     5| import os
     6| import sys
     7| from argparse import ArgumentParser
     8| import LibreNMS
     9| import LibreNMS.wrapper as wrapper
    10| WRAPPER_TYPE = "poller"
    11| DEFAULT_WORKERS = 16
    12| """
    13|     Take the amount of threads we want to run in parallel from the commandline
    14|     if None are given or the argument was garbage, fall back to default
    15| """
    16| usage = (
    17|     "usage: %(prog)s [options] <amount_of_workers> (Default: {}"
    18|     "(Do not set too high, or you will get an OOM)".format(DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    19| )
    20| description = "Spawn multiple poller.php processes in parallel."
    21| parser = ArgumentParser(usage=usage, description=description)
    22| parser.add_argument(dest="amount_of_workers", default=DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    23| parser.add_argument(
    24|     "-d",
    25|     "--debug",
    26|     dest="debug",
    27|     action="store_true",
    28|     default=False,
    29|     help="Enable debug output. WARNING: Leaving this enabled will consume a lot of disk space.",
    30| )
    31| parser.add_argument(
    32|     "-m",
    33|     "--modules",
    34|     dest="modules",
    35|     default="",
    36|     help="Enable passing of a module string, modules are separated by comma",
    37| )
    38| args = parser.parse_args()
    39| config = LibreNMS.get_config_data(os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__)))
    40| if not config:
    41|     logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    42|     logger.critical("Could not run {} wrapper. Missing config".format(WRAPPER_TYPE))
    43|     sys.exit(1)
    44| log_dir = config["log_dir"]
    45| log_file = os.path.join(log_dir, WRAPPER_TYPE + "_wrapper.log")
    46| logger = LibreNMS.logger_get_logger(log_file, debug=args.debug)
    47| scheduler = config.get("schedule_type").get("poller", "legacy")
    48| enabled = True if scheduler == "legacy" else scheduler == "cron"
    49| if not enabled:
    50|     logger.debug("Polling is not enabled for cron scheduling")
    51|     sys.exit(0)
    52| try:
    53|     amount_of_workers = int(args.amount_of_workers)
    54| except (IndexError, ValueError):
    55|     amount_of_workers = DEFAULT_WORKERS
    56|     logger.warning(
    57|         "Bogus number of workers given. Using default number ({}) of workers.".format(
    58|             amount_of_workers
    59|         )
    60|     )
    61| wrapper.wrapper(
    62|     WRAPPER_TYPE,
    63|     amount_of_workers=amount_of_workers,
    64|     config=config,
    65|     log_dir=log_dir,
    66|     modules=args.modules or "",
    67|     _debug=args.debug,
    68| )

    14|  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.See the

    47| @push('scripts')
    48| <script>
    49| var network_nodes = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    50| var network_edges = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    51| $.post( '{{ route('maps.getdevicelinks') }}', {device: {{$device->device_id}}, link_types: @json($data['link_types'])})
    52|     .done(function( data ) {
    53|         var devices = [];
    54|         $.each(data, function( link_id, link ) {
    55|             var this_edge = link['style'];
    56|             this_edge['from'] = link['ldev'];
    57|             this_edge['to'] = link['rdev'];
    58|             this_edge['label'] = link['ifnames'];
    59|             network_edges.add(this_edge);
    60|             devices[link['ldev']] = true;
    61|             devices[link['rdev']] = true;
    62|         });
    63|         $.post( '{{ route('maps.getdevices') }}', {devices: Object.keys(devices), url_type: 'links'})
    64|             .done(function( data ) {
    65|                 $.each(data, function( dev_id, dev ) {
    66|                     let title = document.createElement("div");
    67|                     title.innerHTML = dev["url"];
    68|                     var this_dev = {id: dev_id, label: dev["sname"], title: title, shape: "box"};
    69|                     if (dev["style"]) {
    70|                         this_dev = Object.assign(dev["style"], this_dev);
    71|                     }
    72|                     network_nodes.add(this_dev);
    73|                 });
    74|                 network_nodes.flush();
    75|             });
    76|         network_edges.flush();
    77|     });
    78| var height = $(window).height() - 100;
    79| $('#netmap').height(height + 'px');
    80| var container = document.getElementById('netmap');
    81| var options = {!! $data['visoptions'] !!};
    82| var data = {
    83|     nodes: network_nodes,
    84|     edges: network_edges,
    85|     stabilize: true
    86| };
    87| var network = new vis.Network(container, data, options);
    88| network.on('click', function (properties) {
    89|     if (properties.nodes > 0) {
    90|        window.location.href = "{{ @url('device') }}/device="+properties.nodes+"/tab=neighbours/selection=map/"
    91|     }
    92| });

   177|     function edgeSave(event) {
   178|         edgedata = event.data.data;
   179|         edgeNodesUpdate(edgedata.id, $("#edgefrom").val(), $("#edgeto").val(), edgedata.edge1.from, edgedata.edge2.from);
   180|         $("#edge-saveButton").off("click");
   181|         edgedata.edge1.smooth.type = $("#edgestyle").val();
   182|         edgedata.edge2.smooth.type = $("#edgestyle").val();
   183|         edgedata.edge1.from = $("#edgefrom").val();
   184|         edgedata.edge2.from = $("#edgeto").val();
   185|         edgedata.edge1.font.face = edgedata.edge2.font.face = $("#edgetextface").val();
   186|         edgedata.edge1.font.size = edgedata.edge2.font.size = $("#edgetextsize").val();
   187|         edgedata.edge1.font.color = edgedata.edge2.font.color = $("#edgetextcolour").val();
   188|         edgedata.edge1.font.align = edgedata.edge2.font.align = $("#edgetextalign").val();
   189|         edgedata.edge1.font.background = edgedata.edge2.font.background = '#FFFFFF';
   190|         edgedata.edge1.label = edgedata.edge2.label = edgeLabel($("#edgetextshow").prop('checked'), $("#edgebpsshow").prop('checked'), null);
   191|         edgedata.edge1.width = edgedata.edge2.width = parseFloat($("#edgefixedwidth").val()) || null;
   192|         edgedata.edge1.title = edgedata.edge2.title = $("#port_id").val();
   193|         edgedata.edge1.arrowStrikethrough = edgedata.edge2.arrowStrikethrough = false;
   194|         let newlabel = $("#edgelabel").val() || '';
   195|         if (newlabel == '' && edgedata.mid.label != '') {
   196|             $("#map-renderButton").show();
   197|         }
   198|         edgedata.mid.label = newlabel;
   199|         if(edgedata.id) {
   200|             if($("#port_id").val()) {
   201|                 edge_port_map[edgedata.id] = {port_id: $("#port_id").val(), port_name: $("#port_name").text(), reverse: $("#portreverse")[0].checked}
   202|             } else {
   203|                 delete edge_port_map[edgedata.id];
   204|             }
   205|         }
   206|         if(edgedata.edge2.smooth.type == "curvedCW") {
   207|             edgedata.edge2.smooth.type = "curvedCCW";
   208|         } else if (edgedata.edge2.smooth.type == "curvedCCW") {
   209|             edgedata.edge2.smooth.type = "curvedCW";
   210|         }
   211|         if(edgedata.add) {
   212|             network_nodes.add([edgedata.mid]);
   213|             network_nodes.flush();
