   237|     function edgeEditDefaults() {
   238|         $("#edgeModalLabel").text('{{ __('map.custom.edit.edge.defaults_title') }}');
   239|         $("#edgestyle").val(newedgeconf.smooth.type);
   240|         $("#edgefixedwidth").val(newedgeconf.width);
   241|         $("#edgetextface").val(newedgeconf.font.face);
   242|         $("#edgetextsize").val(newedgeconf.font.size);
   243|         $("#edgetextcolour").val(newedgeconf.font.color);
   244|         $("#edgetextalign").val(newedgeconf.font.align || "horizontal");
   245|         $("#edgetextshow").bootstrapSwitch('state', (newedgeconf.label.includes('xx%') || newedgeconf.label.includes('true')));
   246|         $("#edgebpsshow").bootstrapSwitch('state', (newedgeconf.label.includes('bps')));
   247|         $('#edgecolourtextreset').attr('disabled', 'disabled');
   248|         $(".existing-edge").hide();
   249|         $(".new-edge").show();
   250|         $('#edgeModal').modal({backdrop: 'static', keyboard: false}, 'show');
   251|     }
   252|     function edgeEdit(edgedata) {
   253|         if(edgedata.add) {
   254|             $("#edgeModalLabel").text('{{ __('map.custom.edit.edge.add') }}');
   255|         } else {
   256|             $("#edgeModalLabel").text('{{ __('map.custom.edit.edge.edit') }}');
   257|         }
   258|         $("#portsearch").val('');
   259|         $("#portsearch").trigger('change');
   260|         var nodes = network_nodes.get({
   261|           fields: ['id', 'label'],
   262|           filter: function (item) {
   263|             return (!item.id.endsWith("_mid"));
   264|           },
   265|         });
   266|         $("#edgefrom").find('option').remove().end();
   267|         $("#edgeto").find('option').remove().end();
   268|         $.each( nodes, function( node_idx, node ) {
   269|             if (! node.id.endsWith('_mid') && ! node.id.startsWith("legend_")) {
   270|                 $("#edgefrom").append('<option value="' + node.id + '">' + node.label+ '</option>');
   271|                 $("#edgeto").append('<option value="' + node.id + '">' + node.label+ '</option>');
   272|             }
   273|         });
   274|         $("#edgefrom").val(edgedata.edge1.from);
   275|         $("#edgeto").val(edgedata.edge2.from);
   276|         edgePortSearchUpdate($("#edgefrom").val(), $("#edgeto").val(), edgedata.id);
   277|         edgeCheckColourReset(edgedata.edge1.font.color, newedgeconf.font.color, "edgecolourtextreset");
   278|         $("#edgestyle").val(edgedata.edge1.smooth.type);
   279|         $("#edgetextface").val(edgedata.edge1.font.face);
   280|         $("#edgetextsize").val(edgedata.edge1.font.size);
   281|         $("#edgetextcolour").val(edgedata.edge1.font.color);
   282|         $("#edgetextalign").val(edgedata.edge1.font.align || "horizontal");
   283|         $("#edgetextshow").bootstrapSwitch('state', (edgedata.edge1.label != null && edgedata.edge1.label.includes('xx%')));
   284|         $("#edgebpsshow").bootstrapSwitch('state', (edgedata.edge1.label != null && edgedata.edge1.label.includes('bps')));
   285|         $("#edgelabel").val('label' in edgedata.mid ? edgedata.mid.label : '');
   286|         $("#edgefixedwidth").val(edgedata.edge1.width);
   287|         $(".existing-edge").show();
   288|         $(".new-edge").hide();
   289|         $("#edge-saveButton").on("click", {data: edgedata}, edgeSave);
   290|         $('#edgeModal').modal({backdrop: 'static', keyboard: false}, 'show');
   291|     }
   292|     function edgePortSearchUpdate(node1_id, node2_id, edge_id) {
   293|         node1 = network_nodes.get(node1_id);
   294|         node2 = network_nodes.get(node2_id);

    94|     function edgeNodesRemove(nm_id, edgeid) {
    95|         if (nm_id in edge_nodes_map) {
    96|             const edge_idx = edge_nodes_map[nm_id].indexOf(edgeid);
    97|             if (edge_idx >= 0) {
    98|                 edge_nodes_map[nm_id].splice(edge_idx, 1);
    99|             }
   100|         }
   101|     }
   102|     function edgeNodesUpdate(edgeid, node1_id, node2_id, old_node1_id, old_node2_id) {
   103|         var nm_id = node1_id < node2_id ? node1_id + '.' + node2_id : node2_id + '.' + node1_id;
   104|         var old_nm_id = old_node1_id < old_node2_id ? old_node1_id + '.' + old_node2_id : old_node2_id + '.' + old_node1_id;
   105|         if (nm_id == old_nm_id) {
   106|             return;
   107|         }
   108|         if (old_node1_id > 0 && old_node2_id > 0) {
   109|             edgeNodesRemove(old_nm_id, edgeid);
   110|         }
   111|         if (!(nm_id in edge_nodes_map)) {
   112|             edge_nodes_map[nm_id] = [];
   113|         }

   361|     function toggleLegend() {
   362|         var width = $("#mapwidth").val();
   363|         var mapwdith = 100;
   364|         if (!isNaN(width)) {
   365|             mapwidth = width;
   366|         } else if (width.includes("px")) {
   367|             mapwidth = width.replace("px", "");
   368|         } else if (width.includes("%")) {
   369|             mapwidth = window.innerWidth * width.replace("%", "") / 100;
   370|         }
   371|         if (legend.x < 0) {
   372|             legend.x = mapwidth - 50;
   373|             legend.y = 100;
   374|         } else {
   375|             legend.x = -1;
   376|             legend.y = -1;
   377|         }
   378|         redrawLegend();
   379|     }
   380|     function redrawLegend() {

   454|     function saveMapData() {
   455|         $("#map-saveDataButton").attr('disabled', 'disabled');
   456|         var nodes = {};
   457|         var edges = {};
   458|         $.each(network_nodes.get(), function (node_idx, node) {
   459|             if(node.id.startsWith("legend_")) {
   460|                 return;
   461|             } else if(node.id.endsWith("_mid")) {
   462|                 edgeid = node.id.split("_")[0];
   463|                 edge1 = network_edges.get(edgeid + "_from");
   464|                 edge2 = network_edges.get(edgeid + "_to");
   465|                 edges[edgeid] = {id: edgeid, text_colour: edge1.font.color, text_size: edge1.font.size, text_face: edge1.font.face, text_align: edge1.font.align, from: edge1.from, to: edge2.from, showpct: (edge1.label != null && edge1.label.includes("xx%")), showbps: (edge1.label != null && edge1.label.includes("bps")), label: (node.label || ''), fixed_width: (edge1.width || null), port_id: edge1.title, style: edge1.smooth.type, mid_x: node.x, mid_y: node.y, reverse: (edgeid in edge_port_map ? edge_port_map[edgeid].reverse : false)};
   466|             } else {
   467|                 if(node.icon.code) {
   468|                     node.icon = node.icon.code.charCodeAt(0).toString(16);
   469|                 } else {
   470|                     node.icon = null;
   471|                 }
   472|                 if(node.image && "unselected" in node.image) {
   473|                     if(node.image.unselected.indexOf(custom_image_base) == 0) {
   474|                         node.image.unselected = node.image.unselected.replace(custom_image_base, "");
   475|                         node.nodeimage = null;
   476|                     } else if(node.image.unselected.indexOf(nodeimage_base) == 0) {
   477|                         node.nodeimage = node.image.unselected.replace(nodeimage_base, "");
   478|                         node.image = undefined;
   479|                     } else {
   480|                         node.image = undefined;
   481|                         node.nodeimage = null;
   482|                     }
   483|                 }
   484|                 nodes[node.id] = node;
   485|             }
   486|         });

   488|             url: '{{ route('maps.custom.data.save', ['map' => $map_id]) }}',

   585|     function refreshMap() {
   586|         edge_nodes_map = [];
   587|         $.get( '{{ route('maps.custom.data', ['map' => $map_id]) }}')
   588|             .done(function( data ) {
   589|                 $.each( data.nodes, function( nodeid, node) {
   590|                     var node_cfg = {};
   591|                     node_cfg.id = nodeid;
   592|                     if(node.device_id) {
   593|                         node_device_map[nodeid] = {device_id: node.device_id, device_name: node.device_name, device_image: node.device_image};
   594|                         node_cfg.title = node.device_id;
   595|                     } else if(node.linked_map_id) {
   596|                         node_cfg.title = "map:" + node.linked_map_id;
   597|                     } else {
   598|                         node_cfg.title = null;
   599|                     }
   600|                     node_cfg.label = node.label;
   601|                     node_cfg.shape = node.style;
   602|                     node_cfg.borderWidth = node.border_width;
   603|                     node_cfg.x = node.x_pos;
   604|                     node_cfg.y = node.y_pos;
   605|                     node_cfg.font = {face: node.text_face, size: node.text_size, color: node.text_colour, background: '#FFFFFF'};
   606|                     node_cfg.size = node.size;
   607|                     node_cfg.color = {background: node.colour_bg, border: node.colour_bdr};
   608|                     if(node.style == "icon") {
   609|                         node_cfg.icon = {face: 'FontAwesome', code: String.fromCharCode(parseInt(node.icon, 16)), size: node.size, color: node.colour_bdr};
   610|                     } else {
   611|                         node_cfg.icon = {};
   612|                     }
   613|                     if(node.style == "image" || node.style == "circularImage") {
   614|                         if(node.image) {
   615|                             node_cfg.image = {unselected: custom_image_base + node.image};
   616|                         } else if(node.nodeimage) {
   617|                             node_cfg.image = {unselected: nodeimage_base + node.nodeimage};
   618|                         } else if (node.device_image) {
   619|                             node_cfg.image = {unselected: node.device_image};
   620|                         } else {
   621|                             node_cfg.shape = newnodeconf.shape;
   622|                             node_cfg.icon = newnodeconf.icon;
   623|                             node_cfg.image = newnodeconf.image || undefined;
   624|                         }
   625|                     } else {
   626|                         node_cfg.image = undefined;
   627|                     }
   628|                     if(! ["ellipse", "circle", "database", "box", "text"].includes(node.style)) {
   629|                         node_cfg.font.background = "#FFFFFF";
   630|                     }
   631|                     if (network_nodes.get(nodeid)) {
   632|                         network_nodes.update(node_cfg);
   633|                     } else {
   634|                         network_nodes.add([node_cfg]);
   635|                     }
   636|                 });
   637|                 $.each( data.edges, function( edgeid, edge) {
   638|                     edgeNodesUpdate(edgeid, edge.custom_map_node1_id, edge.custom_map_node2_id, -1, -1);
   639|                     var mid_x = edge.mid_x;
   640|                     var mid_y = edge.mid_y;
   641|                     var mid = {id: edgeid + "_mid", shape: "dot", size: 0, x: mid_x, y: mid_y, label: edge.label};
   642|                     mid.size = 3;
   643|                     var arrows;
   644|                     if (Boolean(reverse_arrows)) {
   645|                         arrows = {from: {enabled: true, scaleFactor: 0.6}, to: {enabled: false}};
   646|                     } else {
   647|                         arrows = {to: {enabled: true, scaleFactor: 0.6}, from: {enabled: false}};
   648|                     }
   649|                     var edge1 = {id: edgeid + "_from", from: edge.custom_map_node1_id, to: edgeid + "_mid", arrows: arrows, font: {face: edge.text_face, size: edge.text_size, color: edge.text_colour, align: edge.text_align, background: '#FFFFFF'}, smooth: {type: edge.style}, arrowStrikethrough: false};
   650|                     var edge2 = {id: edgeid + "_to", from: edge.custom_map_node2_id, to: edgeid + "_mid", arrows: arrows, font: {face: edge.text_face, size: edge.text_size, color: edge.text_colour, align: edge.text_align, background: '#FFFFFF'}, smooth: {type: edge.style}, arrowStrikethrough: false};
   651|                     if(edge.fixed_width) {
   652|                         edge1.width = edge2.width = parseFloat(edge.fixed_width) || null;
   653|                     }
   654|                     if(edge2.smooth.type == "curvedCW") {
   655|                         edge2.smooth.type = "curvedCCW";
   656|                     } else if (edge2.smooth.type == "curvedCCW") {
   657|                         edge2.smooth.type = "curvedCW";
   658|                     }
   659|                     if(edge.port_id) {
   660|                         edge_port_map[edgeid] = {port_id: edge.port_id, port_name: edge.port_name, reverse: edge.reverse};
   661|                         edge1.title = edge2.title = edge.port_id;
   662|                     } else {
   663|                         edge1.title = edge2.title = '';
   664|                     }
   665|                     edge1.label = edge2.label = edgeLabel(edge.showpct, edge.showbps, '');
   666|                     if (network_nodes.get(mid.id)) {
   667|                         network_nodes.update(mid);
   668|                         network_edges.update(edge1);
   669|                         network_edges.update(edge2);

     4|     var custommap = {
     5|         legendPctDefaultColour: function (pct) {
     6|             if (pct < 0) {
     7|                 return "black";
     8|             } else if (pct < 50) {
     9|                 return '#' + parseInt(5.1 * pct).toString(16).padStart(2, 0) + 'ff00';
    10|             } else if (pct < 100) {
    11|                 return '#ff' + parseInt(5.1 * (100.0 - pct)).toString(16).padStart(2, 0) + '00';
    12|             } else if (pct < 150) {
    13|                 return '#ff00' + parseInt(5.1 * (pct - 100.0)).toString(16).padStart(2, 0);
    14|             }
    15|             return '#ff00ff';
    16|         },

    66|         },
    67|         createNetwork: function (elementId, scale, nodes, edges, options, bgtype, bgdata) {
    68|             nodes.flush();
    69|             edges.flush();
    70|             var container = document.getElementById(elementId);
    71|             var network = new vis.Network(container, {nodes: nodes, edges: edges, stabilize: true}, options);
    72|             network_height = $($(container).children(".vis-network")[0]).height();
    73|             network_width = $($(container).children(".vis-network")[0]).width();
    74|             var centreY = Math.round(network_height / (2 * scale));
    75|             var centreX = Math.round(network_width / (2 * scale));
    76|             network.moveTo({position: {x: centreX, y: centreY}, scale: scale});
    77|             setCustomMapBackground(elementId, bgtype, bgdata);
    78|             network.on('zoom', function (data) {
    79|                 if(data.scale < scale) {
    80|                     network.moveTo({position: {x: centreX, y: centreY}, scale: scale});
    81|                 }
    82|             });
    83|             return network;
    84|         },
    85|         getNodeCfg: function (nodeid, node, screenshot, custom_image_base) {
    86|             let nodeimage_base = '{{ route('maps.nodeimage.show', ['image' => '?' ]) }}'.replace("?", "");
    87|             var node_cfg = {};
    88|             node_cfg.id = nodeid;
    89|             if(node.device_id) {
    90|                 node_cfg.title = document.createElement("div");
    91|                 node_cfg.title.innerHTML = node.device_info;
    92|             } else if(node.linked_map_name) {
    93|                 node_cfg.title = "Go to " + node.linked_map_name;
    94|             } else {
    95|                 node_cfg.title = null;
    96|             }
    97|             node_cfg.label = screenshot ? node.label.replace(/./g, ' ') : node.label;
    98|             node_cfg.shape = node.style;
    99|             node_cfg.borderWidth = node.border_width;
   100|             node_cfg.x = node.x_pos;
   101|             node_cfg.y = node.y_pos;
   102|             node_cfg.font = {face: node.text_face, size: node.text_size, color: node.text_colour};
   103|             node_cfg.size = node.size;
   104|             node_cfg.color = {background: node.colour_bg_view, border: node.colour_bdr_view};
   105|             if(node.style == "icon") {
   106|                 node_cfg.icon = {face: 'FontAwesome', code: String.fromCharCode(parseInt(node.icon, 16)), size: node.size, color: node.colour_bdr};
   107|             } else {
   108|                 node_cfg.icon = {};
   109|             }
   110|             if(node.style == "image" || node.style == "circularImage") {
   111|                 if(node.image) {
   112|                     node_cfg.image = {unselected: custom_image_base + node.image};
   113|                 } else if(node.nodeimage) {
   114|                     node_cfg.image = {unselected: nodeimage_base + node.nodeimage};
   115|                 } else if (node.device_image) {
   116|                     node_cfg.image = {unselected: node.device_image};
   117|                 } else {
   118|                     node.style = 'box';
   119|                     node_cfg.shape = 'box';
   120|                     node_cfg.image = undefined;
   121|                 }
   122|             } else {
   123|                 node_cfg.image = undefined;
   124|             }
   125|             if(! ["ellipse", "circle", "database", "box", "text"].includes(node.style)) {
   126|                 node_cfg.font.background = "#FFFFFF";
   127|             }
   128|             return node_cfg;
   129|         },
   130|         getEdgeCfg: function (edgeid, edge, fromto, reverse_arrows) {
   131|             if (Boolean(reverse_arrows)) {
   132|                 arrows = {from: {enabled: true, scaleFactor: 0.6}, to: {enabled: false}};
   133|             } else {
   134|                 arrows = {to: {enabled: true, scaleFactor: 0.6}, from: {enabled: false}};
   135|             }
   136|             var edge_cfg = {id: edgeid + "_" + fromto, to: edgeid + "_mid", arrows: arrows, font: {face: edge.text_face, size: edge.text_size, color: edge.text_colour, background: "#FFFFFF", align: edge.text_align || "horizontal"}, smooth: {type: edge.style}, arrowStrikethrough: false};
   137|             if (fromto == "from") {
   138|                 edge_cfg.from = edge.custom_map_node1_id;
   139|                 var port_pct = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.port_topct : edge.port_frompct;
   140|                 var port_bps = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.port_tobps : edge.port_frombps;
   141|                 var port_colour = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.colour_to : edge.colour_from;
   142|                 var port_width = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.width_to : edge.width_from;
   143|             } else if (fromto == "to") {
   144|                 edge_cfg.from = edge.custom_map_node2_id;
   145|                 var port_pct = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.port_frompct : edge.port_topct;
   146|                 var port_bps = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.port_frombps : edge.port_tobps;
   147|                 var port_colour = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.colour_from : edge.colour_to;
   148|                 var port_width = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.width_from : edge.width_to;
   149|                 if(edge_cfg.smooth.type == "curvedCW") {
   150|                     edge_cfg.smooth.type = "curvedCCW";
   151|                 } else if (edge_cfg.smooth.type == "curvedCCW") {
   152|                     edge_cfg.smooth.type = "curvedCW";
   153|                 }
   154|             } else {
   155|                 console.log("custommapGetEdgeCfg got an invalid value in fromto:" + fromto);
   156|                 return {};
   157|             }
   158|             if(edge.port_id) {
   159|                 edge_cfg.title = document.createElement("div");
   160|                 edge_cfg.title.innerHTML = edge.port_info;
   161|                 if(edge.showpct) {
   162|                     edge_cfg.label = port_pct + "%";
   163|                 }
   164|                 if(edge.showbps) {
   165|                     if(edge_cfg.label == null) {
   166|                         edge_cfg.label = '';
   167|                     } else {
   168|                         edge_cfg.label += "\n";
   169|                     }
   170|                     edge_cfg.label += port_bps;
   171|                 }
   172|                 edge_cfg.color = {color: port_colour};
   173|                 edge_cfg.width = parseFloat(edge.fixed_width) || port_width;
   174|             }
   175|             return edge_cfg;
   176|         },
   177|         getEdgeMidCfg: function (edgeid, edge, screenshot) {
   178|             var mid_x =  edge.mid_x;
   179|             var mid_y =  edge.mid_y;
   180|             return {id: edgeid + "_mid", shape: "dot", size: 0, x: mid_x, y: mid_y, label: screenshot ? '' : edge.label, font: {face: edge.text_face, size:  edge.text_size, color: edge.text_colour}};

   245|     function nodeSave(event) {
   246|         node = event.data.data;
   247|         $("#node-saveButton").off("click");
   248|         if($("#device_id").val()) {
   249|             node.title = $("#device_id").val();
   250|         } else if($("#maplink").val()) {
   251|             node.title = "map:" + $("#maplink").val();
   252|         } else {
   253|             node.title = '';
   254|         }
   255|         node.label = $("#nodelabel").val();
   256|         node.shape = $("#nodestyle").val();
   257|         node.font.face = $("#nodetextface").val();
   258|         node.font.size = parseInt($("#nodetextsize").val());
   259|         node.font.color = $("#nodetextcolour").val();
   260|         node.color = {highlight: {}, hover: {}};
   261|         node.color.background = node.color.highlight.background = node.color.hover.background = $("#nodecolourbg").val();
   262|         node.color.border = node.color.highlight.border = node.color.hover.border = $("#nodecolourbdr").val();
   263|         node.size = $("#nodesize").val();
   264|         if(node.shape == "image" || node.shape == "circularImage") {
   265|             let imgsrc = $("#nodeimage").val();

   267|                 node.image = {unselected: $("#device_image").val()};

   272|             }

   274|             node.image = undefined;
   275|         }

   277|             node.icon = {face: 'FontAwesome', code: String.fromCharCode(parseInt($("#nodeicon").val(), 16)), size: $("#nodesize").val(), color: node.color.border};

   285|             delete node.add;

   287|         } else {

   289|         }

   293|             } else {
   294|                 delete node_device_map[node.id];
   295|             }
   296|         }

   298|         $("#map-renderButton").show();
   299|     }

    22|     $('#imageDeleteModal').on('show.bs.modal', () => {
    23|         let $imageDeleteModalLabel = $('#imageDeleteModalLabel');
    24|         $imageDeleteModalLabel.text($imageDeleteModalLabel.data('text').replace(':name', pendingImageToDelete.name));
    25|     });
    26|     var pendingImageToDelete;
    27|     function startImageDelete(target) {
    28|         let $target = $(target);
    29|         pendingImageToDelete = {
    30|             id: $target.data('image-id'),
    31|             name: $target.data('image-name'),
    32|         };
    33|         $('#imageDeleteModal').modal('show');
    34|         $('#imageDeleteModal').modal('show');
    35|     }
    36|     function deleteImage() {
    37|         $.ajax({
    38|             url: "{{ route('maps.nodeimage.destroy', ['image' => '?']) }}".replace('?', pendingImageToDelete.id),
    39|             type: 'DELETE'
    40|         }).done(() => {
    41|             $('#image-' + pendingImageToDelete.id).remove();
    42|             pendingMapToDelete = null;
    43|             $('#imageDeleteModal').modal('hide');
    44|             $('#imagedeleteerror').text('');
    45|         }).fail((jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) => {
    46|             $('#imagedeleteerror').text('Error deleting: ' + jqXHR.responseText);
    47|         });
    48|     }
    49| </script>

    25|     function appendImageRow(node_image_id, name) {
    26|         $("#manage-custom-nodeimages").append('' +
    27| '        <div id="image-' + node_image_id + '" class="even:tw-bg-gray-50 dark:even:tw-bg-zinc-900">' +
    28| '            <div class="tw-flex tw-justify-between tw-p-3 tw-items-center hover:tw-bg-gray-100 dark:hover:tw-bg-gray-600">' +
    29| '                <div id="imagename-' + node_image_id + '">' + name + '</div>' +
    30| '                <div>' +
    31| '                    <img id="imageview-' + node_image_id + '" src="' + '{{ route('maps.nodeimage.show', ['image' => '?' ]) }}'.replace("?", node_image_id) + '" width="25" height="25">' +
    32| '                </div>' +
    33| '                <div class="tw-whitespace-nowrap">' +
    34| '                    <button class="btn btn-default" onclick="imageModalEdit(' + node_image_id + ');">' +
    35| '                        <i class="fa fa-pencil" aria-hidden="true"></i>' +
    36| '                        <span class="tw-hidden sm:tw-inline" aria-hidden="false">{{ __('Edit') }}</span>' +
    37| '                    </button>' +
    38| '                    <button class="btn btn-danger"' +
    39| '                            onclick="startImageDelete(this)"' +
    40| '                            data-image-name="' + name + '"' +
    41| '                            data-image-id="' + node_image_id + '"' +
    42| '                    ><i class="fa fa-trash" aria-hidden="true"></i>' +
    43| '                        <span class="tw-hidden sm:tw-inline" aria-hidden="false">{{ __('Delete') }}</span>' +
    44| '                    </button>' +
    45| '                </div>' +
    46| '            </div>' +
    47| '        </div>' +
    48|         '');
    49|     }
    50|     $(document).ready(function () {
    51|         @foreach($images as $image)
    52|         appendImageRow({{ $image->custom_map_node_image_id }}, '{{ $image->name }}');
    53|         @endforeach
    54|     });
    55| </script>
    56| @endsection

# FILE: resources/views/map/custom-nodeimage-modal.blade.php

# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-114 ---
     1| <div class="modal fade" id="imageModal" tabindex="-1" role="dialog" aria-labelledby="imageModalLabel" aria-hidden="true">
     2|     <div class="modal-dialog" role="document">
     3|         <div class="modal-content">
     4|             <div class="modal-header">
     5|                 <h5 class="modal-title" id="imageModalEditLabel">{{ __('map.custom.nodeimage.title.edit') }}</h5>
     6|                 <h5 class="modal-title" id="imageModalNewLabel">{{ __('map.custom.nodeimage.title.new') }}</h5>
     7|             </div>
     8|             <div class="modal-body tw-p-10">
     9|                 <x-input id="nodeimage"
    10|                          x-ref="nodeimage"
    11|                          type="file"
    12|                          label="{{ __('map.custom.nodeimage.upload') }}"
    13|                          accept="image/png,image/jpeg,image/svg+xml,image/gif"
    14|                          onChange="imageModalSetImage(event)">
    15|                 </x-input>
    16|                 <x-input id="nodeimagename"
    17|                          x-ref="nodeimagename"
    18|                          type="text"
    19|                          value=""
    20|                          label="{{ __('map.custom.nodeimage.name') }}">
    21|                 </x-input>
    22|                 <div>
    23|                     <div class="tw-text-red-600" id="nodeimageerror"></div>
    24|                 </div>
    25|             </div>
    26|             <div class="modal-footer">
    27|                 <button type=button class="btn btn-primary" onClick="imageModalSave()">{{ __('Save') }}</button>
    28|                 <button type=button class="btn btn-default" onClick="imageModalClose()">{{ __('Cancel') }}</button>
    29|             </div>
    30|         </div>
    31|     </div>
    32| </div>
    33| <script>
    34|     var imageModalData = {};
    35|     $('#imageModal').on('show.bs.modal', () => {
    36|         if(imageModalData.image_id) {
    37|             $("#imageModalEditLabel").show();
    38|             $("#imageModalNewLabel").hide();
    39|         } else {
    40|             $("#imageModalEditLabel").hide();
    41|             $("#imageModalNewLabel").show();
    42|         }
    43|     });
    44|     function imageModalEdit(image_id) {
    45|         imageModalData.image_id = image_id;
    46|         imageModalData.image_name = $("#imagename-" + image_id).text().trim();
    47|         imageModalReset();
    48|         $('#imageModal').modal({backdrop: 'static', keyboard: false}, 'show');
    49|         $("#nodeimage").val('');
    50|     }
    51|     function imageModalReset() {
    52|         imageModalData.image_content = null;
    53|         $("#nodeimagename").val(imageModalData.image_name);
    54|     }
    55|     function imageModalSetImage(event) {
    56|         imageModalData.image_content = event.target.files[0];
    57|         $("#nodeimagename").val(imageModalData.image_content.name.split(".")[0]);
    58|     }
    59|     function imageModalSave() {
    60|         if (! imageModalData.image_content && ! imageModalData.image_id) {
    61|             this.imageModalClose();
    62|             return;
    63|         }
    64|         let fd = new FormData();
    65|         if(imageModalData.image_content) {
    66|             fd.append('image', imageModalData.image_content);
    67|         }
    68|         fd.append('name', $("#nodeimagename").val());
    69|         let url = null;
    70|         let method = null;
    71|         if(imageModalData.image_id) {
    72|             url = '{{ route('maps.nodeimage.update', ["image" => "?"]) }}'.replace('?', imageModalData.image_id);
    73|         } else {
    74|             url = '{{ route('maps.nodeimage.store') }}';
    75|         }
    76|         fetch(url, {
    77|             method: 'POST',
    78|             headers: {
    79|                 'Accept': 'application/json',
    80|                 'X-CSRF-TOKEN': document.head.querySelector('meta[name=\'csrf-token\']').content
    81|             },
    82|             body: fd
    83|         }).then((response) => {
    84|             if (response.status === 413) {
    85|                 $("#nodeimageerror").text(response.statusText);
    86|                 $("#nodeimageerror").show();
    87|                 return;
    88|             }
    89|             response.json().then(data => {
    90|                 if (data.message) {
    91|                     $("#nodeimageerror").text(data.message);
    92|                     $("#nodeimageerror").show();
    93|                 } else {
    94|                     $("#nodeimageerror").hide();
    95|                     imageModalClose();
    96|                     if(imageModalData.image_id) {
    97|                         imgurl = $("#imageview-" + imageModalData.image_id).attr("src").split('?')[0];
    98|                         $("#imageview-" + imageModalData.image_id).attr("src", imgurl + "?" + data.version)
    99|                         $("#imagename-" + imageModalData.image_id).text(data.name)
   100|                     } else {
   101|                         appendImageRow(data.id, data.name);
   102|                     }
   103|                 }
   104|             })
   105|         })
   106|         .catch(() => {
   107|             $("#nodeimageerror").text('Ooops! Something went wrong!');
   108|             $("#nodeimageerror").show();
   109|         });
   110|     }
   111|     function imageModalClose() {
   112|         $('#imageModal').modal('hide');
   113|     }
   114| </script>

     1| @extends('layouts.librenmsv1')
     2| @section('title', __('Device Dependency Map'))
     3| @section('content')
     4| <div class="container-fluid">
     5| <div class="row">
     6| <div class="col-md-12">
     7| @if($group_name)
     8| &nbsp;<big><b>{{ $group_name }}</b></big>
     9| @endif
    10| <div class="pull-right">
    11|     Highlight Node
    12|     <select name="highlight_node" id="highlight_node" class="input-sm" onChange="updateHighlight(this)";>
    13|         <option value="0">None</option>
    14|         <option value="-1">Isolated Devices</option>
    15|     </select>
    16|     <input type="checkbox" class="custom-control-input" id="showparentdevicepath" onChange="updateHighlight(this)">
    17|     <label class="custom-control-label" for="showparentdevicepath">{{ __('Highlight Dependencies to Root Device') }}</label>
    18|     <input type="checkbox" class="custom-control-input" id="showchilddevicepath" onChange="updateHighlight(this)">
    19|     <label class="custom-control-label" for="showchilddevicepath">{{ __('Highlight All Child Devices') }}</label>
    20| </div>
    21| </div>
    22| </div>
    23| <div class="row" id="alert-row">
    24| <div class="col-md-12">
    25| <div class="alert alert-warning" role="alert" id="alert">Loading data</div>
    26| </div>
    27| </div>
    28| <div class="row" id="alert">
    29| <div class="col-md-12">
    30| <div id="visualization"></div>
    31| </div>
    32| </div>
    33| </div>
    34| @endsection
    35| @section('javascript')
    36| <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ asset('js/vis-network.min.js') }}"></script>
    37| <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ asset('js/vis-data.min.js') }}"></script>
    38| @endsection
    39| @section('scripts')
    40| <script type="text/javascript">
    41|     var height = $(window).height() - 100;
    42|     $('#visualization').height(height + 'px');
    43|     var network_nodes = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    44|     var network_edges = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    45|     var network;
    46|     var Countdown;
    47|     var node_highlight_style = @json($highlight_style);
    48|     var highlightSavedId = null;
    49|     function updateHighlight(hlcb) {
    50|         let needRefresh = false;
    51|         if (hlcb.id == 'highlight_node') {
    52|             if ($("#showparentdevicepath")[0].checked || $("#showchilddevicepath")[0].checked) {
    53|                 needRefresh = true;
    54|             } else {
    55|                 let highlightId = parseInt($("#highlight_node").val());
    56|                 if (highlightSavedId && highlightSavedId < 0) {
    57|                     needRefresh = true;
    58|                 }
    59|                 if (refreshHighlight) {
    60|                     refreshHighlight = null;
    61|                     needRefresh = true;
    62|                 }
    63|                 highlightSavedId = highlightId;
    64|                 if (highlightId < 0) {
    65|                     needRefresh = true;
    66|                 } else if (highlightId > 0) {
    67|                     network.selectNodes([highlightId]);
    68|                 } else {
    69|                     network.selectNodes([]);
    70|                 }
    71|             }
    72|         } else if (hlcb.id == 'showchilddevicepath') {
    73|             $("#showparentdevicepath").prop( "checked", false );
    74|             needRefresh = true;
    75|         } else if (hlcb.id == 'showparentdevicepath') {
    76|             $("#showchilddevicepath").prop( "checked", false );
    77|             needRefresh = true;
    78|         }
    79|         if (needRefresh) {
    80|             refreshMap();
    81|         }
    82|     }
    83|     var refreshHighlight = null;
    84|     function refreshMap() {
    85|         var highlight = $("#highlight_node").val();
    86|         refreshHighlight = parseInt(highlight);
    87|         var showpath = 0;
    88|         if ($("#showparentdevicepath")[0].checked) {
    89|             showpath = 1;
    90|         } else if ($("#showchilddevicepath")[0].checked) {
    91|             showpath = -1;
    92|         }
    93| @if($group_id)
    94|         var group = {{ $group_id }};
    95| @else
    96|         var group = null;
    97| @endif
    98|         $.post( '{{ route('maps.getdevices') }}', {disabled: 0, disabled_alerts: null, link_type: "depends", url_type: "links", group: group, highlight_node: highlight, showpath: showpath})
    99|             .done(function( data ) {
   100|                 let device_count = Object.keys(data).length;
   101|                 if (device_count === 0) {
   102|                     $("#alert").text("No devices found");
   103|                     $("#alert-row").show();
   104|                 } else if (device_count > 500) {
   105|                     $("#alert").text("The initial render will be slow due to the number of devices.  Auto refresh has been paused.");
   106|                     $("#alert-row").show();
   107|                 } else {
   108|                     $("#alert").text("");
   109|                     $("#alert-row").hide();
   110|                 }
   111|                 function deviceSort(a,b) {
   112|                     return (data[a]["sname"] > data[b]["sname"]) ? 1 : -1;
   113|                 }
   114|                 var keys = Object.keys(data).sort(deviceSort);
   115|                 $.each( keys, function( dev_idx, device_id ) {
   116|                     var device = data[device_id];
   117|                     let title = document.createElement("div");
   118|                     title.innerHTML = device["url"];
   119|                     var this_dev = {id: device_id, label: device["sname"], title: title, shape: "box", level: device["level"]}
   120|                     if (device["style"]) {
   121|                         this_dev = Object.assign(this_dev, device["style"]);
   122|                     }
   123|                     if (! this_dev.color) {
   124|                         this_dev.color = {};
   125|                     }
   126|                     if (! this_dev.color.border ) {
   127|                         this_dev.color.border = '#2B7CE9';
   128|                     }
   129|                     if (! this_dev.color.background ) {
   130|                         this_dev.color.background = '#D2E5FF';
   131|                     }
   132|                     this_dev.borderWidthSelected = node_highlight_style.borderWidth;
   133|                     this_dev.color.highlight = {};
   134|                     this_dev.color.highlight.background = this_dev.color.background;
   135|                     this_dev.color.highlight.border = node_highlight_style.color.border;
   136|                     if (network_nodes.get(device_id)) {
   137|                         network_nodes.update(this_dev);
   138|                     } else {
   139|                         network_nodes.add([this_dev]);
   140|                         var highlight_option = document.createElement("option");
   141|                         highlight_option.value = device_id;
   142|                         highlight_option.id = "highlight-device-" + device_id;
   143|                         highlight_option.textContent = device["sname"];
   144|                         document.getElementById("highlight_node").appendChild(highlight_option);
   145|                     }
   146|                     $.each( device["parents"], function( parent_idx, parent_id ) {
   147|                         link_id = device_id + "." + parent_id;
   148|                         if (!network_edges.get(link_id)) {
   149|                             network_edges.add([{from: device_id, to: parent_id, width: 2}]);
   150|                         }
   151|                     })
   152|                 })
   153|                 if (! network) {
   154|                     network_nodes.flush();
   155|                     network_edges.flush();
   156|                     var container = document.getElementById('visualization');
   157|                     var options = {!! $options !!};
   158|                     network = new vis.Network(container, {nodes: network_nodes, edges: network_edges, stabilize: true}, options);
   159|                     network.on('click', function (properties) {
   160|                         let cur_highlighted = $('#highlight_node').val();
   161|                         if (properties.nodes > 0) {
   162|                             if (cur_highlighted == properties.nodes) {
   163|                                 $('#highlight_node').val(0).trigger('change');
   164|                             } else {
   165|                                 $('#highlight_node').val(properties.nodes).trigger('change');
   166|                             }
   167|                         } else if (! refreshHighlight) {
   168|                             $('#highlight_node').val(0).trigger('change');
   169|                         }
   170|                     });
   171|                     network.on('doubleClick', function (properties) {
   172|                         if (properties.nodes > 0) {
   173|                             window.location.href = "device/device="+properties.nodes+"/"
   174|                         }
   175|                     });
   176|                 } else {
   177|                     $.each( network_nodes.getIds(), function( dev_idx, device_id ) {
   178|                         if (!(device_id in data)) {
   179|                             network_nodes.remove(device_id);
   180|                             var option_id = "#highlight-device-" + device_id;
   181|                             $(option_id).remove();
   182|                         }
   183|                     });
   184|                 }
   185|                 $("#alert").text("");
   186|                 $("#alert-row").hide();
   187|             });
   188|     }

# FILE: resources/views/map/netmap.blade.php

# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-203 ---
     1| @extends('layouts.librenmsv1')
     2| @section('title', __('Network Map'))
     3| @section('content')
     4| <div class="container-fluid">
     5| <div class="row">
     6| <div class="col-md-12">
     7| @if($group_name)
     8| &nbsp;<big><b>{{ $group_name }}</b></big>
     9| @endif
    10| <div class="pull-right">
    11|     Highlight Node
    12|     <select name="highlight_node" id="highlight_node" class="input-sm" onChange="highlightSelectedNode()";>
    13|         <option value="0">None</option>
    14|     </select>
    15| </div>
    16| </div>
    17| </div>
    18| <div class="row" id="alert-row">
    19| <div class="col-md-12">
    20| <div class="alert alert-warning" role="alert" id="alert">Loading data</div>
    21| </div>
    22| </div>
    23| <div class="row" id="alert">
    24| <div class="col-md-12">
    25| <div id="visualization"></div>
    26| </div>
    27| </div>
    28| </div>
    29| @endsection
    30| @section('javascript')
    31| <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ asset('js/vis-network.min.js') }}"></script>
    32| <script type="text/javascript" src="{{ asset('js/vis-data.min.js') }}"></script>
    33| @endsection
    34| @section('scripts')
    35| <script type="text/javascript">
    36|     var height = $(window).height() - 100;
    37|     $('#visualization').height(height + 'px');
    38|     var network_nodes = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    39|     var network_edges = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    40|     var network;
    41|     var node_highlight_style = @json($highlight_style);
    42|     var highlightSavedId = null;
    43|     function highlightSelectedNode() {
    44|         let highlightId = parseInt($("#highlight_node").val());
    45|         let needRefresh = false;
    46|         if (highlightSavedId && highlightSavedId < 0) {
    47|             needRefresh = true;
    48|         }
    49|         if (refreshHighlight) {
    50|             refreshHighlight = null;
    51|             needRefresh = true;
    52|         }
    53|         highlightSavedId = highlightId;
    54|         if (highlightId < 0) {
    55|             needRefresh = true;
    56|         } else if (highlightId > 0) {
    57|             network.selectNodes([highlightId]);
    58|         } else {
    59|             network.selectNodes([]);
    60|         }
    61|         if (needRefresh) {
    62|             refreshMap();
    63|         }
    64|     }
    65|     var refreshHighlight = null;
    66|     async function refreshMap() {
    67|         var highlight = $("#highlight_node").val();
    68|         refreshHighlight = parseInt(highlight);
    69| @if($group_id)
    70|         var group = {{$group_id}};
    71| @else
    72|         var group = null;
    73| @endif
    74|         var hide_devices = new Map();
    75|         await $.ajax({
    76|             type: 'POST',
    77|             url: '{{ route('maps.getdevices') }}',
    78|             data: {disabled: 0, disabled_alerts: null, url_type: "links", group: group, highlight_node: highlight},
    79|             dataType: 'json',
    80|             success: function (data) {
    81|                 if (Object.keys(data).length === 0) {
    82|                     $("#alert").text("No devices found");
    83|                     $("#alert-row").show();
    84|                 } else if (Object.keys(data).length > 500) {
    85|                     $("#alert").text("The initial render will be slow due to the number of devices.  Auto refresh has been paused.");
    86|                     $("#alert-row").show();
    87|                 } else {
    88|                     $("#alert").text("");
    89|                     $("#alert-row").hide();
    90|                 }
    91|                 var keys = Object.keys(data).sort(function (a, b) {
    92|                     return (data[a]["sname"] > data[b]["sname"]) ? 1 : -1; // sort by display name
    93|                 });
    94|                 $.each( keys, function( dev_idx, device_id ) {
    95|                     var device = data[device_id];
    96|                     let title = document.createElement("div");
    97|                     title.innerHTML = device["url"];
    98|                     var this_dev = {id: device_id, label: device["sname"], title: title, shape: "box"}
    99|                     if (device["style"]) {
   100|                         this_dev = Object.assign(this_dev, device["style"]);
   101|                     }
   102|                     if (! this_dev.color) {
   103|                         this_dev.color = {};
   104|                     }
   105|                     if (! this_dev.color.border ) {
   106|                         this_dev.color.border = '#2B7CE9';
   107|                     }
   108|                     if (! this_dev.color.background ) {
   109|                         this_dev.color.background = '#D2E5FF';
   110|                     }
   111|                     this_dev.borderWidthSelected = node_highlight_style.borderWidth;
   112|                     this_dev.color.highlight = {};
   113|                     this_dev.color.highlight.background = this_dev.color.background;
   114|                     this_dev.color.highlight.border = node_highlight_style.color.border;
   115|                     if (network_nodes.get(device_id)) {
   116|                         network_nodes.update(this_dev);
   117|                     } else {
   118|                         network_nodes.add([this_dev]);
   119|                         var highlight_option = document.createElement("option");
   120|                         highlight_option.value = device_id;
   121|                         highlight_option.id = "highlight-device-" + device_id;
   122|                         highlight_option.textContent = device["sname"];
   123|                         document.getElementById('highlight_node').appendChild(highlight_option);
   124|                     }
   125|                     hide_devices.set(device_id.toString(), null);
   126|                 })
   127|                 $.each( network_nodes.getIds(), function( dev_idx, device_id ) {
   128|                     if (!(device_id in data)) {
   129|                         network_nodes.remove(device_id);
   130|                         var option_id = "#highlight-device-" + device_id;
   131|                         $(option_id).remove();
   132|                     }
   133|                 });
   134|             }
   135|         });
   136|         await $.ajax({
   137|             type: 'POST',
   138|             url: '{{ route('maps.getdevicelinks') }}',
   139|             data: {disabled: 0, disabled_alerts: null, group: group, link_types: @json($link_types)},
   140|             dataType: 'json',
   141|             success: function (data) {
   142|                 $.each( data, function( link_id, link ) {
   143|                     var this_edge = link['style'];
   144|                     this_edge['from'] = link['ldev'];
   145|                     this_edge['to'] = link['rdev'];
   146|                     this_edge['label'] = link['ifnames'];
   147|                     this_edge['title'] = document.createElement("div");
   148|                     this_edge['title'].innerHTML = link['url'];
   149|                     if (!network_edges.get(link_id)) {
   150|                         network_edges.add([this_edge]);
   151|                     }
   152|                     hide_devices.delete(link['ldev'].toString());
   153|                     hide_devices.delete(link['rdev'].toString());
   154|                 })
   155|                 $.each( network_edges.getIds(), function( link_idx, link_id ) {
   156|                     if (!(link_id in data)) {
   157|                         network_edges.remove(link_id);
   158|                     }
   159|                 });
   160|             },
   161|         });
   162|         network_nodes.flush();
   163|         network_edges.flush();
   164|         network_nodes.forEach(function (item) {
   165|             oldval = item.hidden;
   166|             item.hidden = hide_devices.has(item.id.toString());
   167|             if (oldval != item.hidden) {
   168|                 network_nodes.update(item);
   169|             }
   170|         });
   171|         if (! network) {
   172|             var container = document.getElementById('visualization');
   173|             var options = {!! $options !!};
   174|             network = new vis.Network(container, {nodes: network_nodes, edges: network_edges, stabilize: true}, options);
   175|             network.on('click', function (properties) {
   176|                 let cur_highlighted = $('#highlight_node').val();
   177|                 if (properties.nodes > 0) {
   178|                     if (cur_highlighted == properties.nodes) {
   179|                         $('#highlight_node').val(0).trigger('change');
   180|                     } else {
   181|                         $('#highlight_node').val(properties.nodes).trigger('change');
   182|                     }
   183|                 } else if (! refreshHighlight) {
   184|                     $('#highlight_node').val(0).trigger('change');
   185|                 }
   186|             });
   187|             network.on('doubleClick', function (properties) {
   188|                 if (properties.nodes > 0) {
   189|                     window.location.href = "device/device="+properties.nodes+"/"
   190|                 }
   191|             });
   192|         }
   193|     }
   194|     $(document).ready(async function () {
   195|         Countdown.Pause();
   196|         await refreshMap();
   197|         Countdown.Resume();
   198|         $("#alert").text("");
   199|         $("#alert-row").hide();
   200|     });
   201| </script>
   202| <x-refresh-timer :refresh="$page_refresh" callback="refreshMap"></x-refresh-timer>
   203| @endsection

    22|     readonly
    23|   />
    24| </div>
    25| <script type="application/javascript">
    26|     (function () {
    27|         var bgtype = {{ Js::from($map->background_type) }};
    28|         var bgdata = {{ Js::from($background_config) }};
    29|         var reverse_arrows = {{$map->reverse_arrows}};
    30|         var legend = @json($map->legend);
    31|         var custom_image_base = "{{ $base_url }}images/custommap/icons/";
    32|         var network_nodes = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    33|         var network_edges = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    34|         var node_device_map = {};
    35|         var edge_port_map = {};
    36|         var node_link_map = {};
    37|         var network_options = {{ Js::from($map_conf) }};
    38|         var scale = {{ $scale }}
    39|         $.get( '{{ route('maps.custom.data', ['map' => $map->custom_map_id]) }}')
    40|             .done(function( data ) {
    41|                 $.each( data.nodes, function( nodeid, node) {
    42|                     var node_cfg = custommap.getNodeCfg(nodeid, node, Boolean({{$screenshot}}), custom_image_base);
    43|                     if(node.device_id) {
    44|                         node_device_map[nodeid] = {device_id: node.device_id, device_name: node.device_name};
    45|                     } else if(node.linked_map_name) {
    46|                         node_link_map[nodeid] = node.linked_map_id;
    47|                     }
    48|                     network_nodes.add([node_cfg]);
    49|                 });
    50|                 $.each( data.edges, function( edgeid, edge) {
    51|                     var mid = custommap.getEdgeMidCfg(edgeid, edge, Boolean({{$screenshot}}));
    52|                     var edge1 = custommap.getEdgeCfg(edgeid, edge, "from", reverse_arrows);
    53|                     var edge2 = custommap.getEdgeCfg(edgeid, edge, "to", reverse_arrows);
    54|                     if(edge.port_id) {
    55|                         edge_port_map[edgeid] = {device_id: edge.device_id, port_id: edge.port_id};
    56|                     }
    57|                     network_nodes.add([mid]);
    58|                     network_edges.add([edge1, edge2]);
    59|                 });
    60|                 custommap.redrawDefaultLegend(network_nodes, {{ $map->legend_steps }}, {{ $map->legend_x }}, {{ $map->legend_y }}, {{ $map->legend_font_size }}, {{ $map->legend_hide_invalid }}, {{ $map->legend_hide_overspeed }}, {{ Js::from($map->legend_colours) }});
    61|                 network = custommap.createNetwork('custom-map-{{ $id }}', scale, network_nodes, network_edges, network_options, bgtype, bgdata);
    62|                 network.on('doubleClick', function (properties) {
    63|                     edge_id = null;
    64|                     if (properties.nodes.length > 0) {
    65|                         if(properties.nodes[0] in node_device_map) {
    66|                             window.location.href = "device/"+node_device_map[properties.nodes[0]].device_id;
    67|                         } else if (properties.nodes[0] in node_link_map) {
    68|                             window.location.href = '{{ route('maps.custom.show', ['map' => '?']) }}'.replace('?', node_link_map[properties.nodes[0]]);
    69|                         } else if (properties.nodes[0].endsWith('_mid')) {
    70|                             edge_id = properties.nodes[0].split("_")[0];
    71|                         }

# ====================================================================
# FILE: services-wrapper.py
# Total hunks: 2
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-60 ---
     1| """
     2| This is a Bootstrap script for wrapper.py, in order to retain compatibility with earlier LibreNMS setups
     3| """
     4| import logging
     5| import os
     6| import sys
     7| from argparse import ArgumentParser
     8| import LibreNMS
     9| import LibreNMS.wrapper as wrapper
    10| WRAPPER_TYPE = "service"
    11| DEFAULT_WORKERS = 1
    12| """
    13|     Take the amount of threads we want to run in parallel from the commandline
    14|     if None are given or the argument was garbage, fall back to default
    15| """
    16| usage = (
    17|     "usage: %(prog)s [options] <amount_of_workers> (Default: {}"
    18|     "(Do not set too high, or you will get an OOM)".format(DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    19| )
    20| description = "Spawn multiple check-services.php processes in parallel."
    21| parser = ArgumentParser(usage=usage, description=description)
    22| parser.add_argument(dest="amount_of_workers", default=DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    23| parser.add_argument(
    24|     "-d",
    25|     "--debug",
    26|     dest="debug",
    27|     action="store_true",
    28|     default=False,
    29|     help="Enable debug output. WARNING: Leaving this enabled will consume a lot of disk space.",
    30| )
    31| args = parser.parse_args()
    32| config = LibreNMS.get_config_data(os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__)))
    33| if not config:
    34|     logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    35|     logger.critical("Could not run {} wrapper. Missing config".format(WRAPPER_TYPE))
    36|     sys.exit(1)
    37| log_dir = config["log_dir"]
    38| log_file = os.path.join(log_dir, WRAPPER_TYPE + "_wrapper.log")
    39| logger = LibreNMS.logger_get_logger(log_file, debug=args.debug)
    40| scheduler = config.get("schedule_type").get("services", "legacy")
    41| enabled = True if scheduler == "legacy" else scheduler == "cron"
    42| if not enabled:
    43|     logger.debug("Services are not enabled for cron scheduling")
    44|     sys.exit(0)
    45| try:
    46|     amount_of_workers = int(args.amount_of_workers)
    47| except (IndexError, ValueError):
    48|     amount_of_workers = DEFAULT_WORKERS
    49|     logger.warning(
    50|         "Bogus number of workers given. Using default number ({}) of workers.".format(
    51|             amount_of_workers
    52|         )
    53|     )
    54| wrapper.wrapper(
    55|     WRAPPER_TYPE,
    56|     amount_of_workers=amount_of_workers,
    57|     config=config,
    58|     log_dir=log_dir,
    59|     _debug=args.debug,
    60| )
